senses.definition: 太#甜；甜到食唔落口 (too sweet; unpleasantly sweet)

examples.text: 我生日唔使買蛋糕喇，甜耶耶，有乜好食唧。

examples.translation: Don't buy me a cake for my birthday. I don't actually like cakes. They are too sweet.

senses.definition: 深入研究；尤其指透過討論同羅列論點，去揾出答案或者共識 (to inquire into; to investigate; to probe into; to discuss)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: taam3 tou2 hap6 ping3 si6 ji4
examples.translation: to discuss the merger

senses.definition: 一個人嘅#身體 嘅能力；主要係#行動 上嘅能力，例如心肺功能、耐力、爆發力等等 (fitness; physical strength; stamina)

examples.jyutping: tai2 nang4 caak1 jim6
examples.translation: physical test

senses.definition: 去除物品裏面嘅水分（尤其係以人工嘅方法咁做） (dehydration with reference to products, and especially food, through an artificial process)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 脱水嘢係就係頹啲，不過合味道裏面啲脱水蝦，都可以話同我哋一齊過咗好多個十年㗎。
examples.translation: While dehydrated food isn't exactly gourmet, the dehydrated shrimp in Cup Noodles did accompany us for a few decades!

senses.definition: 身體因為失去過多水分導致嘅症狀 (dehydration)

examples.text: 好多人話治療脱水嘅症狀，最好係飲運動飲品，不過其實飲水其實已經夠，仲平好多添。
examples.translation: While many say sport drinks are the best way of treating dehydration, a simple cup of water would work equally well and is cheaper.

senses.definition: 喺受鄙視、俾人睇死、被質疑嘅時候，用嚟反駁對方，指出時間會證明自己啱 (you wait and see)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你唔好睇小我啊！ 你睇住嚟啦！我實發達俾你睇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 tai2 siu2 ngo5 aa3! nei5 tai2 zyu6 lai4 laa1! ngo5 sat6 faat3 daat6 bei2 nei5 tai2!
examples.translation: Don't underestimate me! Just wait and see. I'm going to be rich!

senses.definition: 用#耳 去接收聲音 (to listen; to hear)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: teng1 keoi5 coeng3 go1

senses.definition: 服從；採納建議 (to obey; to accept someone's advice; to listen to)

senses.definition: 放喺「講」「話」呢啲動詞前面，用嚟帶出訊息來源 (according to; used before verbs like #講 gong2 (say) or #話 waa6 (tell) to indicate the source of the information)

senses.definition: 指男性為咗對方嘅身家，同上咗年紀嘅女性發生關係 (to have a love affair with an older woman because of her riches; literally: to dredge an ancient well)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢得嗰三十幾歲人，同個大自己廿年嘅女人一齊，唔係淘古井係咩啊？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dak1 go2 saam1 sap6 gei2 seoi3 jan4, tung4 go3 daai6 zi6 gei2 jaa6 nin4 ge3 neoi5 jan2 jat1 cai4, m4 hai6 tou4 gu2 zeng2 hai6 me1 aa3?
examples.translation: He's only in his thirties and he's dating a woman twenty years his senior. If not for her money, why else would he be with her?

senses.definition: #食煙；本來係講道士練仙，修煉養氣，唔食五穀 (to smoke; literally: to swallow cloud and blow out mist)

senses.definition: 靜靜雞睇一啲唔應該睇嘅嘢 (to peep at; to peek at; to spy on)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 lou5 po4 zai2 neoi2 heoi3 saai3 gaa1 naa4 daai6, lau4 faan1 keoi5 jat1 go3 taai3 hung1 jan4 hoeng2 hoeng1 gong2 wan2 sik6.

examples.translation: My dad loves solving the crossword puzzle when he reads the newspaper every day.

examples.text: 呢度填緊海，第時可能會起樓。

examples.translation: They are reclaiming land in this area, and will probably build some buildings in the future.

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "To")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #昆蟲 嘅一種；一般都係成身綠色或者土黃色，個身修長，個頭呈三角形，對前肢好似鐮刀咁樣，方便佢哋捕食其他昆蟲，佢哋會食啲#害蟲，所以算係益蟲。因為佢哋企起身用對鐮刀手捉嘢嗰個樣令到佢哋好似識打#功夫 咁，所以有唔少功夫門派係基於佢哋啲動作嘅。（量詞：隻） (Mantis)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #廣東 南拳當中嘅周家螳螂拳係一種基於螳螂嘅特色拳法，而且同華北嘅螳螂拳有分別。
examples.translation: Chow Gar, among Guangdong Southern Fists, is a special kung fu style based on the mantis. It differs stylistically from the Mantis Fists style from Northern China.

senses.definition: 同一年出世，指年紀一樣 (of same age)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 tung4 nin4 gaa3.
examples.translation: X

senses.definition: 將貨品畀返原先賣嘅舖頭，要求間鋪畀翻錢或者換過件貨 (to return goods or merchandise)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 因為#粗心 而#忽視、睇少咗某啲重要嘅嘢 (to overlook)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 tai2 lau6 zo2, jyun4 loi4 gam1 jat6 hai6 gaa3 kei4
examples.translation: I overlooked it, but it turns out today is a holiday.

senses.definition: 帶有調侃意味噉發出感慨或疑問 (to roast someone; to bust someone's chops)

examples.text: 佢講嘢真係太多漏洞，令人忍唔住想吐糟。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gong2 je5 zan1 hai6 taai3 do1 lau6 dung6, ling6 jan4 jan2 m4 zyu6 soeng2 tou3 zou1.
examples.translation: I really want to bust his chops over his gibberish.

senses.definition: 成晚唔瞓覺，繼續做嘢或者玩 (to stay up all night (to work or to play))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tung1 deng2 coeng3 kei1
examples.translation: to sing karaoke overnight

senses.definition: 成晚唔瞓覺 (to stay up all night; to work or play overnight without a break; to go out all night)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今晚要通宵，唔使等我食飯。
examples.jyutping: gam1 maan1 jiu3 tung1 siu1, m4 sai2 dang2 ngo5 sik6 faan6.
examples.translation: I have to work overnight tonight. Don't wait for me for dinner.

senses.definition: 唔再響一間#學校#返學，而並唔係因為#畢業 (to leave or quit school (not due to graduation); to discontinue one's studies)

examples.text: 阿松因為移民關係將會喺月尾退學。

examples.translation: Ah-Chung will be quitting the school at the end of the month since he will be emigrating abroad.

senses.definition: 人嘅頭部（量詞：個） (skull)

examples.text: 人嘅頭顱好脆弱，一整親就好麻煩。
examples.jyutping: jan4 ge3 tau4 lou4 hou2 ceoi3 joek6, jat1 zing2 can1 zau6 hou2 maa4 faan4.
examples.translation: The human skull is very fragile. Any injury to the head can cause big trouble.

senses.definition: 食完第一碗飯之後再#裝飯；將飯裝入碗入面 (to refill rice after finishing a bowl of rice)

examples.jyutping: nung4 lik6 san1 nin4 sik6 faan6 jat1 ding6 jiu3 tim1 faan6.
examples.translation: It's customary to refill one's bowl of rice during Chinese New Year meals.

senses.definition: 喺兩個性質相反嘅極端中取得平衡 (to strike a balance between extremes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 中醫講究陰陽調和，因為噉先可以提升睡眠嘅品質。
examples.translation: In traditional Chinese medicine, achieving a balance between Yin and Yang is believed to enhance sleep quality.

senses.definition: 令到另一方陷入一個無必要而且較差甚至原先同佢無關既狀況 (to get someone involved in a difficult situation, to drag someone into a problem that is not their concern)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 gam2 joeng2 to4 leoi6 jan4 laa1!

senses.definition: 枱面 (desk top)

examples.text: 股市冧咗有乜好怕喎，天跌落嚟當被冚，咪重新嚟過囉。

senses.definition: 每個人嘅命運、際遇都唔同，正如每把遮雖然都可以擋雨遮太陽，但係每一把嘅柄都唔同 (human beings have different destinies, no two people's fate is the same; literally: human beings have different fates, umbrellas have different handles)

senses.definition: 令到一個人好冇面，名譽掃地 (to harm someone's reputation; to shave someone's eyebrows)

examples.text: 響我班𡃁面前say no，你而家擺到明剃我眼眉啫。
examples.jyutping: hoeng2 ngo5 baan1 leng1 min6 cin4 sei1 nou1, nei5 ji4 gaa1 baai2 dou3 ming4 tai3 ngo5 ngaan5 mei4 ze1.
examples.translation: Refusing my request in front of my subordinates, you're sabotaging my authority.

senses.definition: 指擺脱怪異癖好，改善社交技巧同衣著，增加自信；脱離#毒撚 行列 (to improve one's confidence and social skills, to uplift one's clothing style and image, in order to get rid of the nerdy, geeky of oneself; to leave the pool of "unpopular guys")

examples.translation: Lately, he's been working hard to change his nerdy ways, and the transformation is striking.

senses.definition: #剋 死老公或者情人嘅女人 (woman whose lovers or husbands are doomed to die; literally: butcher's chopping-board)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢正一劏豬櫈，結咗三次婚，次次個老公唔係病死就意外死。

senses.definition: 整冧一間公司嘅高層 (an executive that dooms his or her company repetitively)

senses.definition: 指人死後第一個七日。相傳人死後第七晚半夜魂魄會返屋企，叫做#回魂。傳統習俗上，家人應準備一啲飯菜響廳中，然後上牀就寢迴避，以免離世者記掛家人 (the first seventh day after death of a person. In Chinese tradition, a dead person's ghost will return home on the seventh night, his/her family should prepare some meals in the living room, and go to sleep early to avoid the ghost seeing the family and feels not easy to leave. Literally: the first seven)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲人話頭七好猛㗎，我哋今晚都係早啲走，唔好打搞人喇。
examples.jyutping: di1 jan4 waa6 tau4 cat1 hou2 maang5 gaa3, ngo5 dei6 gam1 maan1 dou1 hai6 zou2 di1 zau2, m4 hou2 daa2 gaau2 jan4 laa3.
examples.translation: Some say ghosts are most active on the seventh night, so we should leave early tonight to avoid disturbing them.

senses.definition: 比喻一堆人只係做返#圍內 人生意，唔出去外邊揾生意做，令到可以揾嘅錢有限，因為市場無法擴張 (an undesirable situation in which people only do business among themselves rather than looking for business outside; as a result there is only a limited amount of money to be made because the market cannot expand; Literally: boiling pond fish in the same pond water)

examples.text: 你喺呢啲屋邨仔開士多，塘水滾塘魚，只會一世冇發達。

examples.jyutping: dit3 can1 jiu3 caa4 di1 tit3 daa2 zau2.
examples.translation: When you fall down, you have to apply some "dit daa zau".

senses.definition: 耕種用嘅土地 (field; farm)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我阿爺喺鄉下有好多田地。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 aa3 je4 hai2 hoeng1 haa2 jau5 hou2 do1 tin4 dei6.
examples.translation: My grandfather has a lot of fields in his home village.

senses.definition: 困難、唔樂觀嘅處境 (wretched situation; plight)

examples.text: 點解我哋會搞到噉嘅田地㗎？
examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 ngo5 dei6 wui5 gaau2 dou3 gam2 ge3 tin4 dei6 gaa3?
examples.translation: How did we end up like this?

senses.definition: 為咗買樓或者租樓，去樓盤、住宅參觀 (to do a flat visit; to visit a flat to find the right property to buy or rent)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢個個禮拜日都去睇樓。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go3 go3 lai5 baai3 jat6 dou1 heoi3 tai2 lau2.
examples.translation: They go visit properties on sale every Sunday.

senses.definition: 一種#雀鳥，熟水性，通常係全身白色或者黑色（量詞：隻） (swan)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tin1 ngo4 wu4
examples.translation: Swan Lake

senses.definition: #公道 (fair; reasonable; justified)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 塊地唔係你嘅，你唔入得去，天公地道吖？
examples.jyutping: faai3 dei6 m4 hai6 nei5 ge3, nei5 m4 jap6 dak1 heoi3, tin1 gung1 dei6 dou6 aa1?
examples.translation: The land is not yours. You can't go in. That's reasonably fair right?

senses.definition: 形容#顏色 嘅一個特徵 ((of colour) light; pale)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: taam5 hung4 sik1
examples.translation: light red

senses.definition: 冇味；味道好清；唔夠味 (tasteless; bland; not salty or sweet enough)

examples.jyutping: taam5 mau6 mau6
examples.translation: tasteless

senses.definition: 預測、預料有壞消息嘅時候用 (to be afraid that; used to politely forecast bad news)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我睇怕你唔可以再嚟喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 tai2 paa3 nei5 m4 ho2 ji5 zoi3 lai4 laa3
examples.translation: I am afraid that you cannot come again.

senses.definition: 起喺河道上面，攔住啲水嘅建築物，用嚟儲水，防洪或者發電（量詞：條） (dam)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 持有嘅多種資產，尤其指有利息收入、有升值能力嘅嘢，譬如#現金、#物業、#股票、#藝術品 等等 (investment portfolio)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #日蝕，古人解釋日蝕係#后羿 寵物天狗食咗#太陽 嘅情況，會出現災難 (solar eclipse, in ancient China, people imagined it happened when the Dog God ate the sun, disasters would happen)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 婦女塗抹胭脂、撲上白粉，盛妝打扮 (to apply cosmetics)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 另一種女人塗脂抹粉，盡量顯得後生啲。
examples.translation: The other women paint in order to try and look young .

senses.definition: 比喻對醜惡嘅事物加以掩飾同美化。 (to whitewash)

examples.text: 幫政權塗脂抹粉，係好唔道德。
examples.translation: It is immoral to whitewash the regime

senses.definition: 加入，並且放時間喺（某行業、某種事務） (to join and devote oneself to (an occupation or social affairs); to throw oneself into (some passion))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 畢業後，大多數人會選擇投身社會。
examples.jyutping: bat1 jip6 hau6, daai6 do1 sou3 jan4 wui5 syun2 zaak6 tau4 san1 se5 wui2.
examples.translation: Upon graduation, many people decide to be part of the society (i.e. to work).

senses.definition: 鐵造嘅喉管或者空心嘅柱，通常指直徑比較細，可以揸喺手（當作武器）嘅 (iron pipe or iron circular hollow section)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 睇人唔著衫／無乜著衫 (to watch a sex show, or to watch a group of scantily dressed people with a lewd mentality; wordplay on 體育, "exercise". Literally: to watch flesh)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 地方、空間填得好密，啱啱好滿晒 (tightly filled; full to the brim)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個貨櫃一早裝到佮佮冚啦，你啲貨質唔入㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 fo3 gwai6 jat1 zou2 zong1 dou3 tap1 tap1 ham6 laa1, nei5 di1 fo3 zat1 m4 jap6 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: At the very start, this container was tightly filled. Your products cannot fit in.

senses.definition: #日程 排得好密，冇乜額外嘅時間 (tightly scheduled)

examples.text: 我今個學期嘅時間表砌到佮佮冚，肯定日日都好忙。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 go3 hok6 kei4 ge3 si4 gaan3 biu2 cai3 dou3 tap1 tap1 ham6, hang2 ding6 jat6 jat6 dou1 hou2 mong4.
examples.translation: I have a tight timetable this semester, I'm sure I'll be very busy every day.

senses.definition: 由#元 朝到#民國 時期嘅中國邊疆官職，由當地原住民族（#土著）首領擔任世襲官職 (tusi, native chieftains recognized as imperial officials from Yuan dynasty to early years of Republic of China)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 團體嘅成員（量詞：名／位／個） (member of a group)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今年合唱團團員總共有五十位。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 hap6 coeng3 tyun4 tyun4 jyun4 zung2 gung6 jau5 ng5 sap6 wai2.
examples.translation: This year, there are 50 members in the choir.

senses.definition: 運用邏輯思考嘅方式，組織一件事嘅前因後果（量詞：個／套） (logic; inference; reasoning)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: teoi1 lei5 siu2 syut3
examples.translation: detective fiction

senses.definition: 有耐性咁觀察情況嘅轉變之後，再作出決定 (to watch how things unfold before making any decisions)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 睇定啲先，唔好咁快做決定
examples.jyutping: tai2 ding6 di1 sin1 m4 hou2 gam3 faai3 zou6 kyut3 ding6
examples.translation: Take a look first and don't make a hasty decision

senses.definition: （理解、分析）徹底；全面 ((of understanding, analysis) penetrating; thorough)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: tau3 cit3 ge3 fan1 sik1
examples.translation: thorough analysis

senses.definition: 屬於同一個組織 ((formal) to belong to the same group)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 tung4 suk6 wui6 gai3 bou6.
examples.translation: We are both part of the accounting department.

senses.definition: 從其他人口中得知 (to hear from others; to be told of something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 聽聞你升咗職喎，恭喜晒！
examples.jyutping: teng1 man4 nei5 sing1 zo2 zik1 wo3, gung1 hei2 saai3!
examples.translation: I've heard about your promotion, congratulations!

senses.definition: 將自己屋企人或者組織嘅成員拉落水；令家人或者組織蒙羞 (to drag one's family or group into trouble; to be a disgrace to the family or group)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢潛逃之後要屋企人同佢還一大筆賭債，認真佗衰家。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 cim4 tou4 zi1 hau6 jiu3 uk1 kei2 jan4 tung4 keoi5 waan4 jat1 daai6 bat1 dou2 zaai3, jing2 zan1 to4 seoi1 gaa1.
examples.translation: He fled and left his family with a large gambling debt. He was such a disaster.

senses.definition: 揭露一啲鮮為人知或被刻意隱瞞嘅事（口吻冇咁正式） ((informal) to reveal or to expose deliberately covered secreted or little-known facts; to put someone on blast)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tek3 baau3 cau2 man4
examples.translation: to expose a scandal

senses.definition: #處男 嘅#尿，用作中藥（童便），而且據講會帶嚟好運 (urine of a male virgin, used as traditional Chinese medicine and said to bring fortune)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋唔係真係飲童子尿咁核突呀嘛？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 m4 hai6 zan1 hai6 jam2 tung4 zi2 niu6 gam3 wat6 dat6 aa6 maa5?
examples.translation: Do they really engage in such disgusting behavior, drinking the urine of male virgins?

senses.definition: 用技巧迫使其他人將#秘密、#情報 講出嚟 (to try and trick someone into giving away a secret, to fish for information without revealing that one is interested)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我唔覺意俾佢套到料，你要小心啲。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 gok3 ji3 bei2 keoi5 tou3 dou3 liu2, nei5 jiu3 siu2 sam1 di1.
examples.translation: I was tricked by him and accidentally revealed some information to him. Be careful!

senses.definition: 畀人用嚟要脅自己嘅衰嘢或者缺點 (evidence against oneself)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你有乜嘢痛腳俾佢揸住啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mat1 je5 tung3 goek3 bei2 keoi5 zaa1 zyu6 aa3?
examples.translation: What leverage does he have against you?

senses.definition: 淡而無味 (tasteless; literally: more tasteless than cat's urine)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我嗌嘅係咖啡嚟㗎噃，因乜解究淡過貓尿嘅？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 aai3 ge3 hai6 gaa3 fe1 lai4 gaa3 bo3, jan1 mat1 gaai2 gau3 taam5 gwo3 maau1 niu6 ge2?
examples.translation: I ordered coffee. Why is this thing tasteless?

senses.definition: 伸頭張望 (to pop one's head out; to poke one's head)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我探頭望下邊個喺條走廊度傾偈。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 taam3 tau4 mong6 haa5 bin1 go3 hai2 tiu4 zau2 long4 dou6 king1 gai2
examples.translation: I poked my head to see who was talking in the corridor.

senses.definition: 出售#丁權；香港新界原居民嘅男丁有權起#丁屋 自住，但未必能揾到土地，於是有地產商或地主會向男丁收購套取丁權去興建房屋，呢個違法行為就叫套丁 (In Hong Kong New Territories, every male indigenous villager over 18 years old is entitled to one concessionary grant during his lifetime to build one small house for himself to live in, this grant is called "Male Indigenous's Right". But actually not every male indigenous can have land to build his house, so some landlords and developers will buy their grants to build housing estate in the village districts. Literally: extracting male indigenous's right)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 正式通知、匯報 (to notify; to report or inform formally)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 官員召開緊記者會，通報最新疫情。
examples.jyutping: gun1 jyun4 ziu6 hoi1 gan2 gei3 ze2 wui2, tung1 bou3 zeoi3 san1 jik6 cing4.
examples.translation: The officials are holding a press conference to update on the latest developments of the epidemic.

senses.definition: #拖延 嘅方式 (delay as a way)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我都搞佢唔掂，而家係噉出拖字訣先㗎咋。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dou1 gaau2 keoi5 m4 dim6, ji4 gaa1 hai6 gam2 ceot1 to1 zi6 kyut3 sin1 gaa3 zaa3.
examples.translation: I can't handle him, so I'm just stalling for now.

senses.definition: 上天嘅譴責、懲罰 (God's punishment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 成日濫用上天嘅名號去咒人畀「皇天擊殺」係會遭天譴㗎！
examples.jyutping: seng4 jat6 laam5 jung6 soeng6 tin1 ge3 ming4 hou6 heoi3 zau3 jan4 bei2 "wong4 tin1 gik1 saat3" hai6 wui5 zou1 tin1 hin2 gaa3!
examples.translation: Threatening others in God's name will bring divine retribution!

senses.definition: 留意煮緊嘅嘢，費事煮過龍或火燭 (to keep an eye on food being cooked to avoid overcooking or kitchen fire)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 弊！無睇火，煎緊條魚燶晒！
examples.jyutping: bai6! mou5 tai2 fo2, zin1 gan2 tiu4 jyu2 nung1 saai3!
examples.translation: Oh no! I forgot about the fish on the pan, and it got burnt.

senses.definition: 維修物業 (to do handyman work)

examples.jyutping: tai2 fo2 lou2
examples.translation: handyman

senses.definition: 呈癱軟狀，並向下垂 (limp and drooping)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: taat3 pei4
examples.translation: carefree and lazy

senses.definition: 全身貼住地板橫卧；癱軟咁響地上坐卧 (to lie with the whole body contacting the ground; to lay or sit limply on the floor)

examples.jyutping: taat3 saa1
examples.translation: sole

senses.definition: 偏離中心點、著力點；向下方#歪 咗 (to deviate from the center or focal point; to hit a lower position than what one aimed at)

examples.jyutping: taat3 kiu1
examples.translation: to miss or to make the shot crooked when shooting or hitting

senses.definition: 指着住拖鞋、涼鞋，行路時唔提起腳踭嘅樣（後面一定要跟住鞋嘅種類） (to walk without raising one's heels, in a pair of slippers / flip-flops (the verb must be followed by the type of footwear))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tek3 to1

senses.definition: 偷偷地比提示 (to give hints or tips surreptitiously)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 先生行開咗啊，你識做呢條就快啲提水喇！
examples.jyutping: sin1 saang1 haang4 hoi1 zo2 aa3, nei5 sik1 zou6 ni1 tiu4 zau6 faai3 di1 tai4 seoi2 laa1.
examples.translation: The teacher is not here. If you know how to do this question, quickly give me a hint!

senses.definition: 貪慕虛榮，追求享受 (only desire for glory and enjoyment without working hard)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 咩都唔做，有功勞佢就自己攞晒，真係貪威識食。
examples.jyutping: me1 dou1 m4 zou6, jau5 gung1 lou4 keoi5 zau6 zi6 gei2 lo2 saai3, zan1 hai6 taam1 wai1 sik1 sik6.
examples.translation: He does nothing but takes all the credit for himself. Such a self-indulgent person.

senses.definition: 舖喺地下嘅布，通常叫#地氈（量詞：張／塊） (rug; blanket)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jung6 zoeng1 taan2 zing2 sik1 go3 fo2
examples.translation: to use a rug to put out the fire

senses.definition: 觸發一啲野，係潛伏咗好耐，只係等緊一個機緣 (spark off)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 新年流流講啲咁唔老嚟嘅嘢點會唔撻著老細把火。
examples.translation: Talking about something inauspicious during new year can easily anger the boss.

senses.definition: #拖延#找數 (to make a payment later)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 好多業主幾百蚊管理費都拖數拖幾個月。
examples.translation: Many flat owners delay paying their management fees for several months, even though it's just a couple hundred dollars.

senses.definition: 肯聽吩咐；易教養 (docile; amenable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 啲學生都唔聽教聽話，激死老師。
examples.jyutping: di1 hok6 saang1 dou1 m4 teng1 gaau3 teng1 waa6, gik1 sei2 lou5 si1.
examples.translation: The students' disobedience frustrates the teacher.

senses.definition: 唔再當#觀音兵，放棄追#娘娘 (to be retired from being a "gun jam bing"; not to pursue the "goddess" anymore)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我退役喇，唔再追娘娘喇，我要揾個好女仔#過人世 。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 teoi3 jik6 laa3, m4 zoi3 zeoi1 noeng4 noeng4 laa3, ngo5 jiu3 wan2 go3 hou2 neoi5 zai2 gwo3 jan4 sai3.
examples.translation: I've retired and no longer chase after my 'goddess.' Now, I just want to find a good girl to settle down with happily.

senses.definition: 將數值提高 (to increase)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 銀行決定調升還款息率。
examples.jyutping: ngan4 hong4 kyut3 ding6 tiu4 sing1 waan4 fun2 sik1 leot2.
examples.translation: The bank decided to increase the interest rate on repayments.

senses.definition: 指避過不幸事件之後，劏隻雞去做祭品，報答神恩 ((as a gesture to thank god) to slaughter a chicken to offer to god after a narrow escape from a misfortune)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你今次逃過大難，真係要劏雞還神喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam1 ci3 tou4 gwo3 daai6 naan6, zan1 hai6 jiu3 tong1 gai1 waan4 san4 laa3!
examples.translation: You should thank god for being saved from the disaster. You need to slaughter a chicken as an offering.

senses.definition: 俾藉口唔做一啲嘢 (to offer excuses to reject to do something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你肯入嚟我公司做，我俾一年100日假你，唔好再推搪喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 han2 jap6 lai4 ngo5 gung1 si1 zou6, ngo5 bei2 jat1 nin4 jat1 baak3 jat6 gaa3 nei5, m4 hou2 zoi3 teoi1 tong2 laa3.
examples.translation: If you join my company, I'll give you 100 days off per year. No more excuses.

senses.definition: #的士（的士行業術語） (taxi (jargon of taxi drivers))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: koeng4 go1 bou6 teng5 zai2 sei2 zo2 fo2.
examples.translation: Keung's taxi broke down.

senses.definition: #匙羹（餐飲行業術語） (spoon (jargon of restaurant waiters))

examples.jyutping: go2 bin1 zoeng1 toi2 jiu3 zek3 teng5 zai2.
examples.translation: That table over there needs a spoon.

senses.definition: 將一樣嘢由嘴傳落食道 (to swallow; to gulp down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: long4 tan1 fu2 jin3
examples.translation: to devour food; to gorge oneself; to wolf down food

senses.definition: #紙巾（量詞：張） (tissue paper; tissue, a disposable piece of absorbent paper as a handkerchief)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ze3 zoeng1 ti1 su4 lai4 maat3 hon6 aa1.
examples.translation: Could you give me a tissue to wipe my sweat?

senses.definition: 喺眾多選擇入面，決定咗揀其中一個 (to have chosen one option out of many choices; to have spotted something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 導演睇中咗一個新人，想揾佢做女主角。
examples.jyutping: dou6 jin2 tai2 zung3 zo2 jat1 go3 san1 jan4, soeng2 wan2 keoi5 zou6 neoi5 zyu2 gok3.
examples.translation: The director has spotted a new actress, and would like her to be the lead.

senses.definition: 唔正當嘅#尋歡 (to seek out sexual pleasure in an inappropriate or secretive way)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我老公去偷歡俾我#斷正。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 lou5 gung1 heoi3 tau1 fun1 bei2 ngo5 tyun5 zeng3.
examples.translation: My husband was caught red-handed having an affair with another woman.

senses.definition: 極之兇惡、十惡不赦嘅罪行 (heinous crime)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你犯下滔天大罪都唔知錯呀？
examples.jyutping: nei5 faan6 haa6 tou1 tin1 daai6 zeoi6 dou1 m4 zi1 co3 aa4?
examples.translation: You committed such heinous crimes; aren't you aware that you're wrong?

senses.definition: 身體冇一忽#皮膚 係完好嘅；周身傷、瘀 (to be beaten black and blue; to suffer cuts and bruises; literally: a body with no part of the skin left intact)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 受猛烈批評、指責 (to be thoroughly refuted or exposed; to be scathingly criticised)

examples.text: 我篇文俾老師改到體無完膚。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 pin1 man2 bei2 lou5 si1 goi2 dou3 tai2 mou4 jyun4 fu1.
examples.translation: My essay was heavily marked with feedback by my teacher.

senses.definition: #投票 (to vote)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 tau4 zo2 piu3 mei6 aa3?
examples.translation: Have you cast your vote yet?

senses.definition: 將稿件傳畀某一間傳媒 (to send; to deliver; to submit; to contribute)

examples.jyutping: tau4 gou2
examples.translation: to contribute a piece of writing or drawing

senses.definition: 參與拍賣競投，同人鬥高價買某件嘢返嚟 (to enter a bid)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 tau4 zo2 gaa3 ce1 faan1 lai4 aa3.
examples.translation: I have won a car in an auction.

senses.definition: 喺一個地方有勢力同埋做非法活動嘅武裝組織 (bandit; brigand)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 上堂嗰陣聽老師#講書、#教書，吸收知識 (to listen to the teacher in a lesson)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zyun1 sam1 teng1 syu1
examples.translation: pay attention in class

senses.definition: 供電系統停止運作 (to have a power cut; to have a blackout)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頂，交成萬蚊管理費都成日停電。

examples.text: 只有嗰堆位高權重、遙不可及嘅人先有資格「貼地」，所以「貼地」本身就係一個如此矛盾嘅詞語。
examples.jyutping: zi2 jau5 go2 deoi1 wai6 gou1 kyun4 zung6, jiu4 bat1 ho2 kap6 ge3 jan4 sin1 jau5 zi1 gaak3 "tip3 dei6", so2 ji5 "tip3 dei6" bun2 san1 zau6 hai6 jat1 go3 jyu4 ci2 maau4 teon5 ge3 ci4 jyu5.
examples.translation: The term "tip dei" itself is full of contradictions: it can only apply to those who are high and mighty.

senses.definition: 形容一個人非常勞累，攰到條腰無力 (totally exhausted; collapsed in exhaustion)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 今日舖頭好忙，我做到攤攤腰。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 pou3 tau2 hou2 mong4, ngo5 zou6 dou3 taan1 taan1 jiu1.
examples.translation: The shop is hectic today, I almost collapsed in exhaustion.

senses.definition: 誇張噉形容湯、羹或者飲品清淡無味，仲淡過平時淨係食齋嘅尼姑啲尿 (tasteless and unappetizing; literally: blander than the urine of (vegetarian) nuns)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢間燒腩舖啲例湯落得嗰些少豬骨，啲味仲淡過師姑尿。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 siu1 laam5 pou2 di1 lai6 tong1 lok6 dak1 go2 se1 siu2 zyu1 gwat1, di1 mei6 zung6 taam5 gwo3 si1 gu1 niu6.
examples.translation: The soup of this restaurant has very little stock and tastes like watered down bud-light.

senses.definition: 光頭；冇晒頭髮 (bald)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: tuk1 tau4 zai2
examples.translation: a bald person

senses.definition: 打電話或者上網嗰陣，同另一方嘅連接中止 ((of internet or telephone connections) to disconnect; to drop)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 打打吓機，就嚟贏嗰陣斷咗線。
examples.jyutping: daa2 daa2 haa5 gei1, zau6 lai4 jeng4 go2 zan6 tyun5 zo2 sin3.
examples.translation: I was in a game, almost won, and the connection dropped.

senses.definition: 辦理手續，確保入住酒店嘅費用已經交齊，結束住房服務 (to check out)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 退房嗰陣記得唔好拎漏嘢啊。
examples.jyutping: teoi3 fong2 go2 zan6 gei3 dak1 m4 hou2 ling1 lau6 je5 aa3.
examples.translation: When you check out, remember to take all your belongings.

senses.definition: 將槍咀塞入口，頂住喉嚨椗或者口腔頂部，然後開槍自殺 (to kill oneself with a gun; to commit suicide by shooting oneself in the mouth; literally "to swallow a gun")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 尋日又有單吞槍自殺嘅新聞。
examples.jyutping: cam4 jat6 jau6 jau5 daan1 tan1 coeng1 zi6 saat3 ge3 san1 man2.
examples.translation: There is another news about someone killing themselves with guns yesterday.

senses.definition: 兩個人有信件來往 (to communicate by letters)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 而家得返好少人會同筆友通信。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 dak1 faan1 hou2 siu2 jan4 wui5 tung4 bat1 jau5 tung1 seon3.
examples.translation: Only a few people write to pen pals now.

senses.definition: #頂尖；#一流 (top; best)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zeoi3 top1
examples.translation: the best

senses.definition: 入硬幣嘅日式貼紙相機，可以執相同埋喺好短嘅時間內曬到啲相出嚟（唔覺有量詞，除非係貼紙相機） (a coin-operated vending machine that contains a camera, allows photo editing and creates instant photos)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 依家即影即有咁流行，旺角啲貼紙相都執得七七八八。
examples.jyutping: ji1 gaa1 zik1 jing2 zik1 jau5 gam3 lau4 hang6, wong6 gok3 di1 tip3 zi2 soeng3 dou1 zap1 dak1 cat1 cat1 baat3 baat3.
examples.translation: Thanks to the current trends in using instant cameras, the Purikura photo booths in Mong Kok are slowly closing down

senses.definition: 喺貼紙相機曬出嚟，集合貼紙同相一身嘅產物（量詞：張） (photo stickers created by a Purikura photo booth)

examples.text: 難得聚埋一齊，下次見都唔知幾時，不如去旺中影貼紙相做個紀念。
examples.jyutping: naan4 dak1 zeoi6 maai4 jat1 cai4, haa6 ci3 gin3 dou1 m4 zi1 gei2 si4, bat1 jyu4 heoi3 wong6 zung1 jing2 tip3 zi2 soeng3 zou6 go3 gei2 nim6.
examples.translation: As we rarely meet up, let's go to Mong Kok Centre and take photo stickers as a memento.

senses.definition: 用刀將隻豬劏開、解體 (to slaughter a pig)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 比喻女人叫聲，好似隻豬俾人劏嗰陣咁嘈咁高音 (also used to describe women's squeals)

examples.jyutping: nei5 coeng3 go1 ding6 tong1 zyu1 aa3?
examples.translation: Are you singing or screaming?

senses.definition: 將秘密、心底嘅諗法講出嚟 (to spit out (e.g. secrets, thoughts, etc.))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢終於吐出自己嘅心聲。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zung1 jyu1 tou3 ceot1 zi6 gei2 ge3 sam1 sing1.
examples.translation: He finally talks about his hidden feeling.

senses.definition: 忘我咁樣享受（事件、回憶） (to revel in; to indulge in)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tou4 zeoi3 jyu1 zi6 gei2 ge3 sing4 zau6
examples.translation: to revel in one's success

phonetic.original: tau4 dap1 dap1 ngaan5 sap1 sap1
jyutping: tau4 dap1 dap1 ngaan5 sap1 sap1

senses.definition: 形容一個人垂頭喪氣 (an expression used to describe that one is dispirited, depressed; literally: crying with one's head down)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢啱啱俾女飛，宜家頭耷耷，眼濕濕，真可憐。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ngaam1 ngaam1 bei2 neoi5 fei1, ji4 gaa1 tau4 dap1 dap1, ngaan5 sap1 sap1, zan1 ho2 lin4.
examples.translation: He was just dumped, totally dispirited now, almost crying, which is quite pathetic.

keywords: tau4 dap1 dap1 ngaan5 sap1 sap1
tau dap dap ngaan sap sap

senses.definition: 以備不時之需 (to prepare against unexpected needs)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 甲：「買咁多藥嘅？」乙：「睇門口啫。」
examples.jyutping: gaap3: maai5 gam3 do1 joek6 ge2? jyut3: tai2 mun4 hau2 ze1.
examples.translation: A: "Why do you buy so many medicines?" B: "They are just for unexpected needs.

senses.definition: 原本指收人入#三合會／#黑社會；而家可以涵蓋一般組織 (originally, to recruit (literally "kick") someone into a triad society; now used in a broader sense to cover normal organisations as well)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我十五歲就俾人踢咗入會。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 sap6 ng5 seoi3 zau6 bei2 jan4 tek3 zo2 jap6 wui2.
examples.translation: I was recruited into a triad when I was fifteen.

senses.definition: 演員、配音員嘅對白（量詞：篇／份／句） ((voice) actor's or actress's lines)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lat1 toi4 ci4
examples.translation: to miss lines

senses.definition: 好似蜜糖咁甜，用嚟氹人嘅説話 (sweet talk)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好少女仔唔鍾意聽甜言蜜語。
examples.jyutping: hou2 siu2 neoi5 zai2 m4 zung1 ji3 teng1 tim4 jin4 mat6 jyu5.
examples.translation: There are only a few girls who don't enjoy sweet-talking.

senses.definition: 喺做#建築#工程 嘅時候用啲平嘅劣質物料，或者用少過應該用嘅料，做嘢唔認真、#偷懶 (to cut corners, to cheat in work and cut down on materials, especially in engineering and construction)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢間學校起嗰陣偷工減料，所以一有啲咩突發事就好危險。
examples.jyutping: nei1 gaan1 hok6 haau6 hei2 go2 zan6 tau1 gung1 gaam2 liu2, so2 ji5 jat1 jau5 di1 me1 dat6 faat3 si6 zau6 hou2 ngai4 him2.
examples.translation: This school was built with subpar quality. It'll be dangerous if any emergency situation emerges.

senses.definition: 覺得一個人低等啲、#鮓 啲，唔值得自己尊重；#鄙視 (to look down on somebody; to despise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我好睇唔起啲乜都唔識、對社會冇貢獻嘅二世祖。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 tai2 m4 hei2 di1 mat1 dou1 m4 sik1, deoi3 se5 wui2 mou5 gung3 hin3 ge3 ji6 sai3 zou2.
examples.translation: I despise those rich kids who are ignorant and have no value to the society.

senses.definition: 一句流行嘅戲言，通常形容某一方輸梗，最好選擇係投降，搏取對方從輕發落 (a common saying used jokingly to refer to situations where somebody is in a hopeless situation and will almost certainly be defeated, and to make note that it is best to concede and to hope the adversary will let them off lightly; literally: lose only half the stakes if you concede)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 反正企硬都冇用，不如投降輸一半，向大佬認錯啦。
examples.jyutping: faan2 zing3 kei5 ngaang6 dou1 mou5 jung6, bat1 jyu4 tau4 hong4 syu1 jat1 bun3, hoeng3 daai6 lou2 jing6 co3 laa1
examples.translation: It's useless to stand your ground, why don't you concede, apologize to the big brother and hope he will go easy on you.

senses.definition: #廿一點 嘅規矩，某啲莊家容許閒家選擇投降，只輸一半嘅賭注 (an optional rule in blackjack, where some dealers allow players to "surrender" to only lose half their bets)
連埋一齊嘅牀位 (a common bed shared by a number of people)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 身體或者心靈上好辛苦、好唔舒服 (painful; suffering; agonising)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 要我成個禮拜唔食煙真係好痛苦㗎！
examples.jyutping: jiu3 ngo5 seng4 go3 lai5 baai3 m4 sik6 jin1 zan1 hai6 hou2 tung3 fu2 gaa3!
examples.translation: It is really painful for me to abandon smoking for a whole week.

senses.definition: 形容食物嘅#味道 好#甜 (very sweet (of taste))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢件酒心朱古力唔漏口，甜絲絲，真係好好食呀！
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 zau2 sam1 zyu1 gu1 lik1 m4 lau6 hau2, tim4 si1 si1, zan1 hai6 hou2 hou2 sik6 aa3!
examples.translation: This chocolate truffle is very sweet but doesn't overwhelms your tongue, it's really good!

senses.definition: 形容人窩心嘅感覺 (pleasant and kind)

examples.text: 你睇佢笑到甜絲絲咁，一定係收到男朋友嘅禮物啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 tai2 keoi5 siu3 dou3 tim4 si1 si1 gam2, jat1 ding6 hai6 sau1 dou2 naam4 pang4 jau5 ge3 lai5 mat6 laa1!

senses.definition: #周圍 、#四周圍 嘅地方；喺所有地方；一個地方裏面嘅大部份或者所有位置 (everywhere, all over the place)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: 通處都係曱甴屎，真係好核突。
examples.jyutping: tung1 syu3 dou1 hai6 gaat6 zaat2 si2, zan1 hai6 hou2 wat6 dat6.
examples.translation: Roach poop is everywhere. It's really disgusting.

senses.definition: 有某啲事影響埋其他人，為佢哋加添負擔或者帶嚟損害 (to encumber; to be a burden; to be a drag on sby)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hai6 ngo5 to1 leoi6 nei5
examples.translation: It's me who is a burden to you.

senses.definition: 同#華人 （量詞:個/位/名） (Chinese people; people of Chinese descent; literally: people of the Tang Dynasty)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tong4 jan4 gaai1
examples.translation: Chinatown

senses.definition: 學校因為惡劣天氣或事故等原因，喺原本要返學嘅日子放假，等學生唔使返學 ((for schools) to suspend classes; to be suspended)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今日#紅雨，所以中小學停晒課。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 hung4 jyu5, so2 ji5 zung1 siu2 hok6 ting4 saai3 fo3.
examples.translation: Due to the red rainstorm signal (issued) today, the secondary and primary schools are all suspended.

senses.definition: 一件事裏邊嘅瑣碎嘢 (trivial matter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 份報告差唔多搞掂晒，淨返啲頭頭尾尾。
examples.jyutping: fan6 bou3 gou3 caa1 m4 do1 gaau2 dim6 saai3, zing6 faan1 di1 tau4 tau4 mei5 mei5.
examples.translation: The report is almost finished, just some trivial matters left to fix.

senses.definition: 成個吞咗落去；完全被毀滅 (to devour; to completely engulf)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hung4 seoi2 tan1 sai6 zo2 seng4 tiu4 cyun1.
examples.translation: The flood has devoured the whole village.

senses.definition: 留意行緊嘅路，小心人或者障礙物 (to watch the step; literally "to see the road")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔好掛住睇電話，要睇路呀！
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 gwaa3 zyu6 tai2 din6 waa2, jiu3 tai2 lou6 aa3!
examples.translation: Don't just look at the phone, you need to watch your step!

senses.definition: 用嚟警告對方風險好大，要小心行事；有時有#恐嚇 意味 (used to warn someone that the risk is high and one should be cautious; sometimes intended as a threat)

examples.text: 呢筆數當你還清，下次睇路呀！
examples.jyutping: ni1 bat1 sou3 dong1 nei5 waan4 cing1, haa6 ci3 tai2 lou6 aa3!
examples.translation: Debt's clear I guess, you better watch out from now on!

senses.definition: 對身體嘅#調理、#保養 (to take care of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你而家坐月要好好調養下自己，唔係到你老咗就後悔喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ji4 gaa1 co5 jyut2 jiu3 hou2 hou2 tiu4 joeng5 haa2 zi6 gei2, m4 hai6 dou3 nei5 lou5 zo2 zau6 hau6 fui3 laa3.
examples.translation: You should take care of your own health during the convalescent period. Otherwise, you will regret it when you grow older.

senses.definition: 同一志向嘅人；清末民初開始，開始專指同一政治志向嘅人 (person with the same spirit or ambition, particularly in the political sense)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋寧願死都唔會出賣自己嘅同志。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ning4 jyun2 sei2 dou1 m4 wui3 ceot1 maai6 zi6 gei2 ge3 tung4 zi3.
examples.translation: We would rather die than sell out our comrades.

senses.definition: 中國國民黨員、中國共產黨員對黨友嘅稱呼；喺新中國成立後，亦成為人民日常普遍嘅稱呼 (comrade or "tongzhi", a title to one's fellow party member in KMT and CCP; customary title used between people in mainland China (similar to "mate"))

examples.jyutping: siu2 ping4 tung4 zi3
examples.translation: Comrade Xiaoping (Deng)

senses.definition: #同性戀 者；會同同性發生#戀情 嘅人 (homosexual person)

examples.jyutping: tung4 zi3 ping4 kyun4
examples.translation: equal rights for people of all sexual orientations

senses.definition: #痛苦、#苦楚；肉體或精神上所感受嘅#苦楚 (physical or psychological pain or suffering)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 無人會明白我同佢分咗手之後嘅痛楚。
examples.jyutping: mou5 jan4 wui5 ming4 baak6 ngo5 tung4 keoi5 fan1 zo2 sau2 zi1 hau6 ge3 tung3 co2.
examples.translation: No one understands the pain I suffer after breaking up with her.

senses.definition: 聽診器，#醫生 用嚟聽病人身體發出嘅#聲 嘅工具 (stethoscope)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 嗱，我而家擺個聽筒喺你背脊呀吓，係會有啲涼浸浸嘅感覺嘅，深呼吸吖。
examples.jyutping: naa4, ngo5 ji4 gaa1 baai2 go3 teng1 tung2 hai2 nei5 bui3 zek3 aa3 haa2, hai6 wui5 jau5 di1 loeng4 zam3 zam3 ge3 gam2 gok3 ge3, sam1 fu1 kap1 aa1.
examples.translation: So now I am going to put a stethoscope on your back, you will feel a bit chilly, take a deep breath.

senses.definition: 即電話聽筒。電話畀人揸住，用嚟講同聽電話嘅部份；主要係固網電話先有嘅，#手提電話 唔會有咁嘅區分；好似「6」個手勢咁嘅形嘅 (handset; telephone receiver)
守夜；夜間守衞 (to keep guard at night)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 做保安睇夜人工會高啲。
examples.jyutping: zou6 bou2 on1 tai2 je2 jan4 gung1 wui5 gou1 di1.
examples.translation: The salary will be higher as a security guard if you work at night.

senses.definition: 利用引擎高轉時既阻力輔助汽車減速既技巧 (Engine braking)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 落斜嗰陣唔好一味踩迫力，記住用拖波輔助避免制動系統過熱失效。
examples.jyutping: lok6 ce3 go2 zan6 m4 hou2 jat1 mei2 caai2 bik6 lik1, gei3 zyu6 jung6 to1 bo1 fu6 zo6 bei6 min5 zai3 dung6 hai6 tung2 gwo3 jit6 sat1 haau6.
examples.translation: Don't just press the brake when you downhill, remember to use the engine braking technique to avoid overheating the braking system.

senses.definition: 調準器，用嚟糾正手表處於不同位置嘅誤差。陀飛輪安裝喺一個每一分鐘、四分鐘或六分鐘旋轉一次嘅小框架。 (Tourbillon, an regulator compensates for differences in rate caused by watch adopting different positions. It mounted in a rotating carriage which make full revolution in one, four or six minutes.  The name "Tourillon" (a French word) comes from this rotation.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 陀飛輪由阿伯拉罕-路易 寶璣發明，喺1801年攞到專利註冊。
examples.jyutping: to4 fei1 leon4 jau4 aa3 baak3 laai1 hon2 lou6 jik6 bou2 gei1 faat3 ming4, hai2 jat1 baat3 ling4 jat1 nin4 lo2 dou3 zyun1 lei6 zyu3 caak3.
examples.translation: The Tourbillon was invented by Abraham-Louis Breguet and patented in 1801.

senses.definition: 相隔得好遠 (to be far apart from each other)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 今日，你同我天各一方，你有你嘅生活，我繼續我嘅忙碌……
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6, nei5 tung4 ngo5 tin1 gok3 jat1 fong1, nei5 jau5 nei5 ge3 sang1 wut6, ngo5 gai3 zuk6 ngo5 ge3 mong4 luk1...
examples.translation: Today, we are far apart from each other. Your life goes on, my life keeps being busy...

senses.definition: 文章、演講或一件事入面，將#重點 簡潔、總括噉歸納出嚟嘅語句 (title; subject)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: biu1 tai4
examples.translation: title

senses.definition: 文章、教學、討論、演講等等嘅內容嘅範圍 (topic)

examples.jyutping: lei4 tai4 maan6 zoeng6
examples.translation: being offtopic

senses.definition: 考試時要求解答嘅#問題 (question, problem)

examples.jyutping: si4 si6 tai4
examples.translation: current affairs question

senses.definition: 磨得好精細嘅白糖，通常用嚟代替白糖整甜品；受熱嘅時候比#砂糖 容易溶；因為唔夠幼細，所以唔可以用嚟裝飾甜品 (caster sugar; superfine sugar)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 用糖粉整嘅曲奇會軟啲㗎。
examples.jyutping: jung6 tong4 fan2 zing2 ge3 kuk1 kei4 wui5 jyun5 di1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Cookies made with caster sugar will be softer.

senses.definition: 行為或消費中產生嘅#温室#氣體 數量（主要係#二氧化碳），例如乘搭採用#化石#燃料 嘅交通工具而產生嘅#碳排放（量詞：公斤） (carbon footprint)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 買本地出產嘅農作物可以有效減少我哋嘅碳足印。
examples.jyutping: maai5 bun2 dei6 ceot1 caan2 ge3 nung4 zok3 mat6 ho2 ji5 jau5 haau6 gaam2 siu2 ngo5 dei6 ge3 taan3 zuk1 jan3.
examples.translation: Buying crops harvested from the local area can effectively reduce our carbon footprint.

senses.definition: 挑戰對方 (challenge somebody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 公開批評人即係擺明想挑機啦!
examples.jyutping: gung1 hoi1 pai1 ping4 jan4 zik1 hai6 baai2 ming4 soeng2 tiu1 gei1 laa1
examples.translation: Criticizing people publicly is obviously challenging them.

senses.definition: 俾人玩、俾人#老點 ，令人無所適從 (to be tricked; to be confused)

examples.text: 我老細一時一樣，點到我陀陀擰。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 lou5 sai3 jat1 si4 jat1 joeng6, dim2 dou3 ngo5 to4 to2 ning6.
examples.translation: My boss changes his mind all the time, which makes me extremely confused.

senses.definition: 由一個#插頭 駁出嚟，有幾個#插蘇 嘅板；一來可以俾電器插遠啲，二來插多啲電器（量詞：塊） (power strip; extension board)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 咪以為係拖板就插幾多嘢都得𠿪，會燒fuse㗎。
examples.jyutping: mai5 ji5 wai4 hai6 to1 baan2 zau6 caap3 gei2 do1 je5 dou1 dak1 gaa2, wui5 siu1 fiu1 si2 gaa3.
examples.translation: Though it is a power strip, it doesn't mean that you can plug in as many devices as you want. You would blow the fuse.

senses.definition: 向另一件嘢施加力令佢靠近；#拉 (to pull; to drag)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: to1 go3 jan4 ceot1 heoi3
examples.translation: to drag a person out

senses.definition: 一直唔做一啲嘢、延誤時間；#揼 (to delay; to procrastinate)

examples.text: 佢將交功課嘅限期一拖再拖。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zoeng1 gaau1 gung1 fo3 ge3 haan6 kei4 jat1 to1 zoi3 to1.
examples.translation: He has been continuously postponing the deadline of the assignment.

senses.definition: 兩個人嘅手掌拍埋一齊、手指扣住 (to hold one's hand)

examples.text: 我見到佢拖住個女仔啊！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gin3 dou2 keoi5 to1 zyu6 go3 neoi5 zai2 aa3!
examples.translation: I saw him holding a girl's hand!

senses.definition: 經過美化粉飾從而引誘人嘅陷阱（量詞：個） (sweet poison; literally: sugarcoated trap)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容非常忙碌，忙到應付唔嚟 (to be very busy, have not a single minute to rest. Literally: feet kicking)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: mong4 dou3 tek3 saai3 goek3
examples.translation: to be extremely busy

senses.definition: 宰殺動物、家禽 (to slaughter animals or poultry, etc.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gwo3 si4 gwo3 zit3, aa3 maa1 dou1 wui5 tong1 gai1 waan4 san4.
examples.translation: My mom offers a chicken as a sacrifice to the gods during festivals.

senses.definition: 將啲嘢斬細 (to cut into pieces)

examples.jyutping: tong1 ce1
examples.translation: to scrap a car

senses.definition: #劏死牛，用武力、威逼、勒索去搶錢 (to extort money from; to blackmail)

examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 soeng6 sam1 zan3 bei2 jan4 tong1 zo2 ng5 baak3 man1
examples.translation: Today in Shenzhen I had $500 extorted from me.

senses.definition: #劏水魚、劏客，指黑店呃人甚至強迫購物。又作「宰客」 (to cheat a customer or to compel purchasing)

examples.text: 一樽藥丸劏人一萬蚊？你有冇良心㗎？
examples.jyutping: jat1 zeon1 joek6 jyun2 tong1 jan4 jat1 maan6 man1? nei5 jau5 mou5 loeng4 sam1 gaa3?
examples.translation: Just a bottle of pills and you cheat the customer out of ten thousand dollars? Where is your conscience?

senses.definition: #劏白鶴，飲酒後嘔吐 (to throw up after ingesting a large quantity of alcohol)

examples.text: 又飲到劏，好心就飲少啲啦。
examples.jyutping: jau6 jam2 dou3 tong1, hou2 sam1 zau6 jam2 siu2 di1 laa1
examples.translation: You're throwing up from drinking again. You'd be better off drinking less.

senses.definition: #氣管 分泌出嚟嘅黏液（量詞：篤） (phlegm; sputum)

senses.definition: 將啲痰#吐 出嚟 (to spit)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 zeoi3 zang1 di1 jan4 zau1 gaai1 tou3 taam4.
examples.translation: I hate people spitting everywhere the most.

senses.definition: 停止營運 (to stop operating/running)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jau4 jyu1 ci4 sin6 gei1 gam1 ting4 wan6, beng6 jan4 mou5 baan6 faat3 wok6 dak1 ji1 liu4 fai3 jung6 zi1 zo6.
examples.translation: As the charity fund closed, patients were not able to have medical expense subsidy.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

senses.definition: 誇張；過於理想 (to exaggerate; to bluff; to give a very idealistic picture)

examples.text: 阿強講就講到天花龍鳳，做出嚟都係不外如是。

senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我年初四會去朋友屋企團拜。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 nin4 co1 sei3 wui2 heoi3 pang4 jau5 uk1 kei5 tyun4 baai3.
examples.translation: I will go to my friend's home with a group of people on the fourth day of the Chinese New Year.

senses.definition: 通風好；風或空氣好易入到 (good ventilation; to let air in easily)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaan1 uk1 hou2 tau3 fung1.

senses.definition: 夜晚仍然開住燈讀書 (to study at night)

examples.text: 呢個同學好勤力，晚晚挑燈夜讀。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 tung4 hok6 hou2 kan4 lik6, maan5 maan5 tiu1 dang1 je6 duk6.

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 讀數學系嚟做咩唧？學埋晒啲屠龍技。

senses.definition: 做一啲好#無聊 嘅事 (figuratively: to do something pointless; literally: to carry a cannon)

senses.definition: 做一啲好#無聊 嘅事 (figuratively: to do something pointless; literally: to carry a cannon)

examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 mau1 hoeng2 dou6 tok3 paau3 me1? faai3 di1 faan1 heoi3 zou6 je5 laa1.

senses.definition: 瓦製品一種，係將陶瓷或者玻璃粉末熔響金屬表面，作保護或者裝飾 (enamel, the glass substance)

senses.definition: 極為憎恨、厭惡 (to abhor)

examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 ceot1 zo2 zoeng1 tung1 gou3 waa6 gaam2 san1.
examples.translation: The company released a notice that is about lowering the salary.

senses.definition: 意見或者諗法一致 (sharing the same opinion; literally: same voice same breath)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 投咩票啫？呢度得三個人，你哋兩個仲要同聲同氣添。
examples.jyutping: tau4 me1 piu3 zek1? ni1 dou6 dak1 saam1 go3 jan4, nei5 dei6 loeng5 go3 zung6 jiu3 tung4 seng1 tung4 hei3 tim1.
examples.translation: Why bother voting? There are only the three of us, and you two are sharing the same opinion.

senses.definition: 講同一隻語言 (speaking the same language)

examples.text: 佢哋兩個都係香港人，同聲同氣，特別好傾。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 go3 dou1 hai6 hoeng1 gong2 jan4, tung4 seng1 tung4 hei3, dak6 bit6 hou2 king1.
examples.translation: They are both from Hong Kong, and as they speak the same language, they find it much easier to talk with each other.

senses.definition: 形容瞞住人暗中做野；靜雞雞做野，唔被人知 (furtive; surreptitious; covert)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 做嘢要光明正大，唔好偷偷摸摸。
examples.jyutping: zou6 je5 jiu3 gwong1 ming4 zing3 daai6, m4 hou2 tau1 tau1 mo1 mo1.
examples.translation: Don't be surreptitious, we should play fair and square.

senses.definition: 海洋名；#地球 五大洋中最大，位於#美洲 同#大洋洲、#亞洲 之間 (Pacific Ocean)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 指公司員工為咗加人工或升職，向老闆提出或者暗示會轉工跳槽 (to seek a pay raise or promotion by suggesting or implying to jump ship; literally, to do the hula)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢邊係想辭工吖，跳下草裙舞想加人工之嘛。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bin1 hai6 soeng2 ci4 gung1 aa1, tiu3 haa5 cou2 kwan4 mou5 soeng2 gaa1 jan4 gung1 za1 maa3.
examples.translation: He isn't quitting. He's just making a fuss to get a pay raise.

senses.definition: #泰國 嘅官方語言，屬於侗台語系，聲調豐富，用泰文字母書寫 (Thai language)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用黏土燒製嘅器具 (pottery)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: tou4 ci4
examples.translation: pottery and porcelain

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "To" or "Tou")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Tung")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #講；#傾 (to talk; to discuss)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gong2 m4 soeng5
examples.translation: not sufficient to claim as

senses.definition: 所講嘅嘢 (talk; speech)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: ngo5 ge3 ging1 jim6 zi1 taam4
examples.translation: my (speaking from) experience

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Tam")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Tam")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #姓氏 一樣 (to have the same surname)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tung4 sing3 cyun1
examples.translation: single-surname village

senses.definition: 加入啲衰人一齊做壞事 (to associate with evil people; to go along with somebody doing evil deeds)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢經唔起引誘，選擇咗同流合污，同其他人一齊販毒。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ging1 m4 hei2 jan5 jau5, syun2 zaak6 zo2 tung4 lau4 hap6 wu1, tung4 kei4 taa1 jan4 jat1 cai4 faan6 duk6.
examples.translation: He couldn't resist the temptation, (so) he chose to go along with the bad lots and be a drug dealer too.

senses.definition: 即係#拖手；兩個人互相拖住對方隻手 (to hold hands)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老豆話以前我好鍾意同佢拖手仔去行街。
examples.jyutping: lou5 dau6 waa6 ji5 cin4 ngo5 hou2 zung1 ji3 tung4 keoi5 to1 sau2 zai2 heoi3 haang4 gaai1.
examples.translation: Dad said that when I was small, I used to love holding his hands and strolling around.

senses.definition: #拍拖 (to be in love, to be in a relationship)

examples.text: 佢哋都係拖吓手仔啫﹐未去到談婚論嫁嘅。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 dou1 hai6 to1 haa5 sau2 zai2 ze1, mei6 heoi3 dou3 taam4 fan1 leon6 gaa3 ge2.
examples.translation: They are only dating and are not considering marrying yet.

senses.definition: 唔鍾意；厭惡 (to dislike; to loathe)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou3 tou2 jim3 ni1 fan6 gung1 zok3.
examples.translation: I dislike this job.

senses.definition: 虛構人物；出自美國作家Edgar Rice Burroughs喺1912年創作嘅同名小説（以及日後創作嘅電影）系列，喺森林入面野生長大，善於爬樹，擁有超人嘅彈跳力，能夠喺樹林入面自由穿梭 (Tarzan)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 湯藥 (liquid preparation of medicinal herbs; decoction)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: caai4 wu4 tong1
examples.translation: a decoction of chinese thorowax root (with other ingredients)

senses.definition: 古時指熱水 (hot water)

examples.jyutping: fu6 tong1 dou6 fo2
examples.translation: to be willing to undergo any hardship

senses.definition: 對視覺感知或者想像所作嘅重現（量詞:幅/個） (picture; image)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 暗中行動；喺人唔察覺時做 (stealthily; secretly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 tau1 tau1 haang4 ceot1 gaan1 fong4.
examples.translation: He left the room secretly.

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Tong")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Tin")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用作#耕種 嘅土地或範圍（量詞：塊／畝） (farm; agricultural land; field)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nung4 tin4
examples.translation: agricultural field

senses.definition: 香港#樂隊 名，由雷有輝、雷有曜、鄧建明、劉賢德、盛旦華、朱翰博同唐奕聰七人組成；又稱「太極樂隊」 (Tai Chi, a Hong Kong rock band)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺特定範圍，用貨架擺賣、做生意嘅地方（量詞：個） (vendor's stand; booth; stall)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: bou3 zi2 taan1 dong3
examples.translation: newspaper stand

senses.definition: 一種#油漆#溶劑，#易燃，好臭，有毒 (paint thinner)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #馬路、#街 名 (Terrace, as a suffix for street names)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: zaa1 din1 toi4
examples.translation: Jardine Terrace

senses.definition: 用嚟做地產項目或者住宅樓宇嘅名 (used in names of buildings or real estate projects)

examples.jyutping: wang4 ging2 toi4
examples.translation: Banyan Garden

senses.definition: 講唔停口，#雞啄唔斷，就好似流水不停奔流 (to talk incessantly; literally: like water rushing out endlessly)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 一講到佢嘅偶像，小明就滔滔不絕。
examples.jyutping: jat1 gong2 dou3 keoi5 ge3 nau5 zoeng6, siu2 ming4 zau6 tou1 tou1 bat1 zyut6.
examples.translation: Talking about his idol, Siu-Ming talks incessantly.

senses.definition: 客人同賣家之間對於價錢上作出溝通 (to bargain; to haggle; literally: to ask price, counteroffer price)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 唔好再同我討價還價喇，生意難做呀！
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 zoi3 tung4 ngo5 tou2 gaa3 waan4 gaa3 laa3, saang1 ji3 naan4 zou6 aa3!
examples.translation: Please do not haggle the price anymore. It'll be hard for me to turn a profit.

senses.definition: 去一個地方探嗰度嘅人 (to visit; to pay a call)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: taam3 fong2 lou5 jan4 jyun2
examples.translation: to visit a nursing home

senses.definition: 光線可以穿過嘅、好通澈明亮 (transparent; diaphanous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 唔係個個夠膽坐透明嘅纜車車廂㗎。
examples.jyutping: m4 hai6 go3 go3 gau3 daam2 co5 tau3 ming4 ge3 laam6 ce1 ce1 soeng1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Not everyone is bold enough for a ride on the transparent carriage cable car.

senses.definition: 完全公開、清楚嘅 ((of processes and governance) transparent; open; accessible by the public)

examples.text: 呢度嘅機制好透明，有利市民去監察政府。
examples.jyutping: nei1 dou6 ge3 gei1 zai3 hou2 tau3 ming4, jau5 lei6 si5 man4 heoi3 gaam1 caat3 zing3 fu2.
examples.translation: The system here is so open and clear, it's easier for the citizens to supervise the government.

senses.definition: 連貫噉敍述某個地方喺唔同時期嘅歷史嘅方式 (comprehensive history)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 tung1 si2
examples.translation: comprehensive history of Hong Kong

senses.definition: 脱離危險 (to escape from danger; to be out of danger)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 醫生話佢已經脱險，情況穩定。
examples.jyutping: ji1 sang1 waa6 keoi5 ji5 ging1 tyut3 him2, cing4 fong3 wan2 ding6.
examples.translation: The doctor says he is out of danger and is stable now.

senses.definition: 經過深思後選擇 (to choose; to select; to pick out)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 所有人都係由佢挑選出嚟嘅。
examples.jyutping: so2 jau5 jan4 dou1 hai6 jau4 keoi5 tiu1 syun2 ceot1 lai4 ge3
examples.translation: All of them are chosen by him.

senses.definition: 一種貼喺#皮膚 有清涼、#降温 感覺嘅#膏布（量詞：塊） (antipyretic paste)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你額頭咁㷫，快啲黏塊退熱貼！
examples.jyutping: nei5 ngaak6 tau4 gam3 hing3, faai3 di1 nim4 faai3 teoi3 jit6 tip3!
examples.translation: Your forehead is so hot. Put on an antipyretic paste now!

senses.definition: 用利器除去身上嘅毛髮 (to shave)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tai3 sou1
examples.translation: to shave one's beard

senses.definition: 加嘢入凹陷嘅地方；喺空白嘅地方加入內容 (to fill; to fill up; to fill in; to fill out; to stuff)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tin4 biu2
examples.translation: to fill out a form

senses.definition: 由一個地方去緊另一個地方嘅期間 (on the way; en route)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 飛機前往香港途中被騎劫。
examples.jyutping: fei1 gei1 cin4 wong2 hoeng1 gong2 tou4 zung1 bei6 ke4 gip3.
examples.translation: The plane was hijacked en route to Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 唔係咁輕易做得到嘅事（量詞：個） (difficulty; challenge)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個係民主國家不得不認真去對付嘅挑戰。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 hai6 man4 zyu2 gwok3 gaa1 bat1 dak1 bat1 jing6 zan1 heoi3 deoi3 fu6 ge3 tiu1 zin3.
examples.translation: This is a challenge the democracies dare not fail to meet.

senses.definition: 喺一棟#建築物 嗰個主要結構外面，又畀牆圍住嘅地方，通常種咗啲植物喺度等人有得唞涼或者休息。 (courtyard; garden; patio; a kind of walled enclosure often featuring plants)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 嶺南風格嘅庭院喺香港同廣東都有好多。
examples.jyutping: ling5 naam4 fung1 gaak3 ge3 ting4 jyun2 hai2 hoeng1 gong2 tung4 gwong2 dung1 dou1 jau5 hou2 do1.
examples.translation: There are lots of Lingnan-style gardens in Hong Kong and Guangdong.

senses.definition: 對於自己嘅#不滿 嘅#申訴 (complaint; notice of a person's dissatisfaction)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松收到個投訴，話佢嘅猥瑣行為令到佢周圍嘅女士覺得不安。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 sau1 dou2 go3 tau4 sou3, waa6 keoi5 ge3 wui1 so2 hang4 wai4 ling6 dou3 keoi5 zau1 wai4 ge3 neoi5 si6 gok3 dak1 bat1 on1
examples.translation: A-chung received a complaint which said that his lewd behaviours make the women around him uncomfortable.

senses.definition: 唐代#詩歌 嘅總稱，通常都係四句或者八句，每句五個或者七個字 (poetry of the Tang Dynasty)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我一早背曬唐詩三百首啦！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jat1 zou2 bui3 saai3 tong4 si1 saam1 baak3 sau2 laa1!
examples.translation: I memorised 300 poetry of the Tang Dynasty!

senses.definition: 擅自攞走人哋嘅財物，諗住據為己有 (to steal; to pilfer)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 tau1 zo2 ngo5 go3 ngan4 baau1
examples.translation: You have stolen my wallet!

senses.definition: 由一個封鎖嘅地方逃走；走甩 (to escape successfully; to get clear of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: mat6 sat1 tou4 tyut3
examples.translation: room escape

senses.definition: 為咗#求生 而#逃走 (to flee for one's life)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: sei2 leoi5 tou4 sang1
examples.translation: to narrowly escape death

senses.definition: 見#逃走 (see #逃走 (tou4 zau2))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 犯事之後走佬，只會加重刑罰。
examples.jyutping: faan6 si6 zi1 hau6 zau2 lou2, zi2 wui5 gaa1 cung5 jing4 fat6.
examples.translation: You will be punished harshly if you run away after the crime.

senses.definition: 將唔好嘅道德觀、思想灌輸俾其他人，令佢哋變壞 (to corrupt someone with bad morals etc; to make somebody become immoral or bad)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 電視嘅暴力畫面荼毒青少年。
examples.jyutping: din6 si6 ge3 bou6 lik6 waa2 min2 tou4 duk6 cing1 siu3 nin4.
examples.translation: Violent scenes on television corrupt the youth.

senses.definition: 田地；原野；郊外 (countryside; open country; field)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gwong2 fut3 ge3 tin4 je5
examples.translation: a vast open country

senses.definition: 為咗學習或者工作而出發去研究、考察嘅#實地 (a place where one is working or studying in real situations, away from the school or office)

examples.jyutping: tin4 je5 haau2 caat3
examples.translation: field study; fieldwork

senses.definition: 俾行人或者車輛跨越馬路、鐵路，或者連接兩棟建築物嘅#橋（量詞：條） (flyover; footbridge)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hang4 jan4 tin1 kiu4
examples.translation: footbridge; skyway; elevated walkway

senses.definition: 時裝表演中，俾模特兒行走展示服裝嘅舞台，呈T字形向觀眾席伸展 (runway; catwalk)

examples.jyutping: haang4 tin1 kiu4
examples.translation: to do the catwalk; to be in a runway show

senses.definition: 輻鰭魚綱鯰形目嘅其中一種淡水魚（量詞：條） (catfish, Clariidae)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個池塘入面有好多塘虱。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 ci4 tong4 jap6 min6 jau5 hou2 do1 tong4 sat1.
examples.translation: There are many catfish in the pool.

senses.definition: #天空 接近#地平線 嘅邊沿部分；並唔係一個真實嘅位置，視乎觀察嘅人會有唔同 (horizons of the sky)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 比喻好遙遠嘅地方 (remote, faraway locations; literally "edge of the sky")

examples.jyutping: hoi2 gok3 tin1 bin1
examples.translation: ends of the sea and earth

senses.definition: 最終結果係 (to turn out that; final)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 球隊花咗好多錢請咗個明星級教練返嚟，但turn out排名都冇升到。
examples.jyutping: kau4 deoi2 faa1 zo2 hou2 do1 cin2 ceng2 zo2 go3 ming4 sing1 kap1 gaau3 lin6 faan1 lai4, daan6 toen1 au1 paai4 ming4 dou1 mou5 sing1 dou3.
examples.translation: The soccer team spent a lot recruiting a star coach, but it turns out that its rank has still not become higher.

senses.definition: 休息一下、避一下暑令個人冇噉熱 (to rest and cool down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 co5 hai2 syu6 haa6 min6 tau2 loeng4.
examples.translation: We sit under the tree to take a rest and cool down a bit.

senses.definition: 喺某啲詞語配搭做最後一個字嘅時候讀 tiu2 (in some collocations, pronounced as tiu2 instead of tiu4)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: syu4 tiu2
examples.translation: French fries

senses.definition: 一個識轉嘅圓盤，上面有幾條扶手，係公園嘅遊玩設施 (playground roundabout)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 細個玩氹氹轉嗰陣，試過揈咗出嚟，跌親個下巴要連針。
examples.jyutping: sai3 go3 waan2 tam4 tam4 zyun3 go2 zan6, si3 gwo3 fing6 zo2 ceot1 lai4, dit3 can1 go3 haa6 paa4 jiu3 lin4 zam1.
examples.translation: While playing on the roundabout at the playground when I was small, I was thrown out, and I hurt my chin so badly I had to get stitched up at the hospital.

senses.definition: 秩序 (order)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: tiu4 lei5
examples.translation: order; organization

senses.definition: 比較長嘅細項、細節 (item; details of requirements)

examples.jyutping: tiu4 lai6
examples.translation: regulations

senses.definition: #推動 一樣嘢#前進 (to propel; to drive; to push; to motivate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個獎推進我去繼續努力。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 zoeng2 teoi1 zeon3 ngo5 heoi3 gai3 zuk6 nou5 lik6.
examples.translation: This prize pushes me to keep working hard.

senses.definition: 軍隊向一個地方或者方向展開攻勢 (to advance; to thrust towards; to move forward)

examples.jyutping: cyun4 gwan1 hoeng3 cin4 teoi1 zeon3 ng5 gung1 lei5!
examples.translation: All troops advance 5 kilometres!

senses.definition: 一等獎；抽獎或者博彩活動入面最好嗰份獎金或者獎品（量詞：份） (first prize (of a lucky draw, lottery, etc.))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今期六合彩頭獎兩注中，每注派彩八千四百幾萬。
examples.jyutping: gam1 kei4 luk6 hap6 coi2 tau4 zoeng2 loeng5 zyu3 zung3, mui5 zyu3 paai3 coi2 baat3 cin1 sei3 baak3 gei2 maan6.
examples.translation: Two winners share the latest Mark Six jackpot, each winning more than HK$84 million.

senses.definition: 比喻同心協力，互相幫助，戰勝困難 (to pull together in times of trouble)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 大家都係香港人，應該同舟共濟。
examples.jyutping: daai6 gaa1 dou1 hai6 hoeng1 gong2 jan4, jing1 goi1 tung4 zau1 gung6 zai3.
examples.translation: All of us are Hong Kong people, we should pull together in times of trouble.

senses.definition: 泛指人抬頭望到嘅#大氣層 空間（量詞：個） (sky)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我想好似雀仔咁喺天空飛翔。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 hou2 ci5 zoek3 zai2 gam2 hai2 tin1 hung1 fei1 coeng4.
examples.translation: I want to fly in the sky like a bird.

senses.definition: 佛教用語，指人死咗之後會#輪迴 到六道之中嘅人道或者畜牲道，靈魂投入胎兒之中 (to be reincarnated; to be reborn)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 有啲人相信人死後有得投胎。
examples.jyutping: jau5 di1 jan4 soeng1 seon3 jan4 sei2 hau6 jau5 dak1 tau4 toi1.
examples.translation: Some people believe that humans will be reincarnated after death.

senses.definition: 引申做死亡 (to die)

examples.jyutping: zaa1 gam3 faai3 gon2 zyu6 heoi3 tau4 toi1 me1?
examples.translation: He is driving very fast. Is he rushing to be reincarnated?

senses.definition: 全部，亦作「#通通」、「#統通」 (all)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 呢班人統統都唔識打字。
examples.jyutping: ni1 baan1 jan4 tung2 tung2 dou1 m4 sik1 daa2 zi6
examples.translation: Not a single one of them knows how to type.

senses.definition:
「#天干」同「#地支」嘅合稱。十天干分別係「#甲#乙#丙#丁#戊#己#庚#辛#壬#癸」。 十二地支係：「#子#丑#寅#卯#辰#巳#午#未#申#酉#戌#亥」。 天干同地支組合就成為以「#甲子」為首嘅六十干支循環。

干支循環通常用嚟計年份。天干亦可以獨立用嚟順序將物件命名，第一個叫「甲」、第二個叫「乙」，如此類推。用法類似西方嘅「A, B, C」 或 「α, β, γ」。中國傳統紀時間嘅方法係將一日分成十二個時辰，每一個時辰由一個地支表示，「子時」係半夜 (11pm 至 1am)，如此類推。 (Literally "Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches". It is a traditional Chinese system of counting. Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches are collectively known as "Stem-Branch".

The 10 Heavenly Stems are 甲(gaap3) 乙(jyut6) 丙(bing2) 丁(ding1) 戊(mou6) 己(gei2) 庚(gang1) 辛(san1) 壬(jam4) 癸(gwai3).

The 12 Earthly Branches are 子(zi2) 丑(cau2) 寅(jan4) 卯(maau5) 辰(san4) 巳(zi6) 午(ng5) 未(mei6) 申(san1) 酉(jau5) 戌(seot1) 亥(hoi6). Each Heavenly Stem is paired with an Earthly Branch to form the "stem-branch" sexagenary (i.e. 60 element) cycle that starts with 甲子 (gaap3 zi2)

The sexagenary cycle is often used for counting years in the Chinese calendar. Heavenly Stems are also used independently to name things in a particular order -- the first is labeled "gaap3", the second "jyut6", the third "bing2", and so on. It is similar to how "A, B, C" and "α, β, γ" are used in western cultures. Earthly Branches are also traditionally used to denote time. One day is divided into twelve slots called Chinese-hours (#時辰), starting from 子時 (zi2 si4), which is 11pm to 1am.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jyut6 dang2 / jyut6 kap1
examples.translation: B grade

senses.definition: 地方社群每隔一段時間舉行嘅傳統活動：全鄉齋戒，舉行一系列道教科儀，向神祇謝罪祈福、酬謝神恩，以求淨化社區（量詞：次／屆） (Tai Ping Ching Chiu, a set of Taoist rituals for thanking deities and asking peace and rest in the community held in a certain cycle)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: coeng4 zau1 taai3 ping4 cing1 ziu3
examples.translation: Cheung Chau Jiao Festival

senses.definition: 馬群之中帶頭嗰隻馬，比喻一個機構入邊嘅第二把交椅。廣東話黑社會入邊啲手下叫#馬仔，而其中地位最高嘅就叫頭馬 (right-hand man; adjutant; literally "head horse" or "stallion")

senses.definition: 世代，用嚟數差唔多世代出世嘅群體 (generation)

examples.text: 我哋呢脱人，個個都識講廣東話㗎。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ni1 tyut3 jan4, go3 go3 dou1 sik1 gong2 gwong2 dung1 waa2 gaa3.
examples.translation: Every person of our generation speaks Cantonese.

senses.definition: #基督教 教徒嘅聚會，通常會跟年齡、性別或者族群嚟分，俾相近嘅教徒或者慕道友聯誼 (communion; Christian fellowship)

senses.definition: 超甜；甜得滯 (extremely sweet; too sweet)

senses.definition: 爸爸嘅兄弟（叔伯）嘅仔 (son of the father's brother)

senses.definition: 指人通曉#人情世故，又明白#事理 (to describe someone who is reasonable, know how to deal with people, and good at reasoning)

examples.text: 你屋企有困難，不如揾老闆商量下啦，佢都幾通情達理嘅。

examples.translation: As you have difficulty in your family, I suggest you seek help from our boss. He is a reasonable person.

senses.definition: 用液體同流質狀嘅嘢覆蓋走一啲嘢 (to blot out; to cross out)

examples.jyutping: zoeng1 di1 co3 zi6 jung6 tou4 goi2 jik6 tou4 zo2 keoi5!
examples.translation: Cross out the wrong words with a correction pen!

senses.definition: 拉長、拉扁咗嘅#圓形；用兩個固定點，離兩點總距離不變噉運行一周畫成嘅形狀（量詞：個） (oval; ellipse)

examples.translation: If the direction is wrong, it can't work no matter how hard you work.

senses.definition: 通常用嚟占卜嘅一套類似於撲克牌嘅卡牌，亦可以用嚟玩遊戲（比較少），通常有78張紙牌，係一種象徵圖像系統 (Tarot)

examples.jyutping: muk6 tung2
examples.translation: wooden bucket; wooden pail

senses.definition: 領袖；上司 (leader; chief; head; boss)

senses.definition: 動物用嘅第三人稱複數代名詞；粵語入面冇區分唔同種類嘅第三人稱複數代名詞，一律用 #佢哋 (they; them; third person plural pronoun for animals in written Chinese; such distinction is not made in Cantonese and only #佢哋 keoi5 dei6 is used)

senses.definition: 向某人尋求庇護 (to seek refuge from sby)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to seek refuge from one's relatives

senses.definition: 將山坡整理成一層層梯狀細塊平地嘅#農田（量詞：塊／片） (terrace (agriculture))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 世上最大嘅一種#鳥 類，源自#非洲，可以跑得好快，但唔識飛（量詞：隻） (ostrich)

senses.definition: 爸爸嘅兄弟（叔伯）嘅女，年齡又細過自己嘅（量詞：個） (daughter of a brother of one's father, who is younger than oneself; younger female patrilineal cousin)

senses.definition: 古代婦女或者小朋友著嘅貼身內衣（量詞：件） (undergarment covering the chest and abdomen, for ancient women and kids)

examples.text: 邊度有人偷肚兜咁變態㗎？
examples.jyutping: bin1 dou6 jau5 jan4 tau1 tou5 dau1 gam3 bin3 taai3 gaa3?
examples.translation: Why would there be people stealing underwear, being so perverted?

senses.definition: 由清單中拎走；#篩 走一個人或者某樣嘢 (to pick out; to remove something from a list)

examples.text: 面試前要剔除唔合格嘅考生先。
examples.jyutping: min6 si5 cin4 jiu3 tik1 ceoi4 m4 hap6 gaak3 ge3 haau2 sang1 sin1.

examples.jyutping: ting4 zin3 hip3 ji5

senses.definition: 唔自在；唔舒服；囉囉攣 (to feel uneasy and restless; to be on tenderhooks)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 人類或動物既外形線條。 (body shape)

senses.definition: 合約上必須遵守嘅條文 (conditions; terms)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mau6 jik6 tiu4 gin2
examples.translation: terms of trade

senses.definition: 為咗做到某件事，而首先要符合嘅項目（量詞：個） (requirement; prerequisite; qualification)

examples.text: 入呢間大學嘅首要條件係考試成績好。
examples.jyutping: jap6 ni1 gaan1 daai6 hok6 ge3 sau2 jiu3 tiu4 gin2 hai6 haau2 si3 sing4 zik1 hou2

senses.definition: 天賦才能或者家庭嘅資源 (natural endowment or resources from one's family)

examples.jyutping: jau5 tiu4 gin2
examples.translation: to be well supported by one's (wealthy) family

senses.definition: 有#糖水 賣嘅舖頭（量詞：間） (dessert shop selling tong sui)

examples.text: 放工我要去糖水舖食芝麻糊。
examples.jyutping: fong3 gung1 ngo5 jiu3 heoi3 tong4 seoi2 pou2 sik6 zi1 maa4 wu2.
examples.translation: I want to eat black sesame soup in a dessert shop after work.

senses.definition: 廣東菜入面嘅飯後甜品，一般都係甜嘅湯水，入面有好多唔同嘅配料（量詞：碗） (tong sui; a kind of soupy dessert in Cantonese cuisine with a wide variety of ingredients; literally "sugar water")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sik6 tong4 seoi2
examples.translation: to have tong sui

senses.definition: 一種電動機械遊戲機，接近賭博（技術含量低）。機內有一大堆代幣，後面有啲機關將啲銀推出嚟作為獎賞，玩家放入自己代幣，希望用少量嘅代幣令個機關推跌更多出嚟。 (coin pusher; a game machine where there is often a platform where coins fall into it and are accumulated, and the player is enticed to insert coins, which could potentially cause more coins to be pushed out of the platform, which if it happens is taken by the player as a reward)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #跳馬 練習用嘅箱，有唔同高度 (vaulting box)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
形容為官或者在上位嘅人處理糾紛嘅時候公正無私 (strictly impartial and incorruptible)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 包大人鐵面無私，斷案如神。
examples.jyutping: baau1 daai6 jan4 tit3 min6 mou4 si1, dyun6 on3 jyu4 san4.
examples.translation: Justice Bao is really impartial and skillfull when solving cases.

senses.definition: 中止，通常講關係、往來 (to cut off (ties or contact))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tyun5 zyut6 ngoi6 gaau1 gwaan1 hai6
examples.translation: to sever diplomatic relations

senses.definition: 由頭到尾；用嚟計日子嘅總數 (from beginning to end; altogether; in total; used when counting the total number of days)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 tau4 mei5 heoi3 zo2 ng5 jat6.
examples.translation: We went there five days in total.

senses.definition: 術數嘅一種；根據出生年月日及時間推算六親情形以及唔同歲數嘅運程，時間更加要精準至「刻」（十五分鐘） (one of the divination methods)

senses.definition: 極度#憎恨 (to hate bitterly; to utterly detest; to loathe)

examples.text: 如果可以恨你，全力痛恨你，你連遇上亦要躲避。

senses.definition: 𢳂湯用嘅餐具；形狀似一隻加大碼匙羹，末端成碗狀（量詞：個） (soup ladle)

senses.definition: 熟#桐油 加#石灰 溝成嘅黏合物料，有防水作用 (putty consisting of tung oil and lime)

senses.definition: 通宵上演嘅#神功戲 表演（量詞：場／齣） (traditional opera performances dedicated to deities during midnight)

senses.definition: 一種用嚟做#麪包、#甜品 嘅食材，#弱酸 性，白色粉末，來自釀葡萄酒嘅副產品；見#發粉、#自發粉 (cream of tartar; potassium bitartrate)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺河、湖呢啲#淡水 入面棲息嘅#魚；同#鹹水魚 相對（量詞：條） (freshwater fish)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 淡水魚好多寄生蟲，唔好生食呀。

senses.definition: 泛指貪污嘅政府人員 (corrupted office bearers in the government)

examples.jyutping: taam1 gun1 wu1 lei6 bit1 seoi1 sing4 zi1 jyu1 faat3.
examples.translation: Corrupted officials and civil servants must be punished by law.

senses.definition: 去探望病咗嘅人；通常係去#醫院 或者對方屋企 (to visit a patient or a sick person, especially when the sick person is in hospital or home)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我唔得閒，因為我要去醫院探我媽咪病啊！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 dak1 haan4, jan1 wai6 ngo5 jiu3 heoi3 ji1 jyun2 taam3 ngo5 maa1 mi4 beng6 aa3!
examples.translation: I'm not free because I need to go to the hospital to visit my sick mum.

senses.definition: 合乎規格或者期望，應該唔會出咩差錯 (appropriate; proper)

examples.translation: handled in a proper manner

senses.definition: #追債 (to demand repayment of a debt or loan)

examples.jyutping: faan2 zing3 ho2 ji5 zou6 ge3 je5 dou1 zou6 zo2, zau6 syun3 go3 git3 gwo2 m4 hou2 dou1 tai2 hoi1 di1 laa1!
examples.translation: We have done what we can do already, so just be tolerant even though the result is bad.

senses.definition: 因為發票户口冇錢，#兑現 唔到，退返轉頭嘅#支票（量詞：張） (a bounced cheque)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種廣東#粥 料理。行內俗稱「一灣」。由昔日廣州西關荔枝灣水上嘅#艇户 創製。當時荔灣艇家將鮮魚片、鮮蝦仁、石螺肉、油炸鬼、碎牛肉、海蜇絲、乾魷魚絲、炸豬皮、炸粉絲、叉燒絲、煎蛋絲、火鴨絲等煮成粥後加上脆炒花生、薑絲同葱花，賣畀其他艇家或船客。而家嘅港式艇仔粥大致只會保留炸花生、魷魚絲、炸豬皮同碎牛肉。 (sampan congee)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 歇後語 - 出又刮入又刮 ；指商人做生意賺盡每分利益、剝削顧客；呢句盛行於民國末年，當時特指剝削成性嘅銀行同找換店，事源民國政府於1948年推出金圓券，未幾大幅貶值，大眾紛紛將錢換成外匯(包括港元)，找換店同銀行乘機對出入匯兑嘅客户大刮一筆，此事亦產生左一批與香港相關嘅用語如#鹹龍 同 #刮龍 (razor lintel - "to shave everyone in and out", means businessman squeeze every penny from the customer; this term was specifically used in 1948, 49 to describe the exploitative financial businesses, Government of Republic of China issued the new "Gold Dollar Note" and it devalued dramatically right after, everyone rushed to Exchange Shop and Bank to exchange foreign currency (including HK dollar), but the rate and charge was very harsh.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 「剃刀刮耐門楣爛，賭棍扒多席面穿。」-- 廖恩燾《廣州即事》之三
examples.translation: razor shaves too long making the lintel collapsed, gambler and cheater steal too much making the mat worn out." -- Liu Yan To, "Nowadays in GuangZhou"(3)

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
將儲咗響銀行户口嘅錢拎返出嚟；提取款項；係更為正式嘅講法 ((more formal) to draw money from a bank; to withdraw money from a cash dispenser)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #停止、唔再#生產，通常用於產品上 (to discontinue; to cease production)

examples.text: 酒廠宣佈兩款威士忌將會喺今年內停產。

examples.translation: The distillery announced that production of two types of whisky would cease within the year.

senses.definition: 暫停#牌照 (to disqualify a licence)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 cung1 hung4 dang1, zeoi3 hau6 bei2 jan4 ting4 paai4.

senses.definition: 一隻股票喺交易所臨時禁止交易 ((of stocks) to be suspended)

senses.definition: （賭博）停止發牌 (to stop drawing (in card game))

examples.translation: (Blackjack) The dealer's hand is resolved by drawing cards until the hand achieves a value of 17 or higher.

senses.definition: 一種中國傳統骨牌遊戲，亦可以用#十五湖 嘅紙牌玩。同#牌九 所用到嘅骨牌一樣，玩法係四個人每人八隻牌，輪流根據出咗嘅牌嘅花色同大細鬥大，喺最後一個回合出嘅牌最大就係贏家 (Tien Gow or Tin Kau, a Chinese dominoes game; literally: heaven and nine)

senses.definition: 一種食用#淡水魚，有幾條明顯嘅鬍，喺夜間出沒，以進食小魚、#蝦 同埋#昆蟲、水生植物等維生 (Airbreathing catfish)

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
用白麪皮捲住糖葱、椰絲、芝麻等等餡料嘅街頭小食；糖葱並唔係葱，只係用糖整成好似葱咁中空嘅條狀（量詞：塊） (candy and coconut wrap)

examples.jyutping: daan6 taat1

senses.definition: 連#湯 一齊食嘅#麪（量詞：碗） (noodles in soup)

senses.definition: 唔可以改變嘅嘢 (unchangeable)

examples.jyutping: tit3 zak1
examples.translation: hard rule

senses.definition: 由夜晚去到天光、日出，成晚流流長 (all night until daybreak; all night long)

senses.definition: 形容一個好難解決嘅問題 (having a difficult problem, thinking hard about a problem, "scraching one's head"; literally: itchy head)

senses.definition: #鐵 或者#鋼 做嘅高#塔（量詞：座） (tower made with iron or steel)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baa1 lai4 tit3 taap3
examples.translation: Eiffel Tower

senses.definition: 商業機構唔做生意，關門大吉 (to stop doing business; to close down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: noi6 bou6 wai4 sau1, zaam6 si4 ting4 jip6.
examples.translation: Temporarily closed for repairs.

senses.definition: tick tak聲響 ("tick tak" sound)
senses.label: 擬聲詞

examples.text: 熄左啲舊式冷氣之後，會有啲沙石彈跳嘅聲音，剔剔撻撻咁。
examples.translation: There are some tick-tak sounds coming from the air-conditioner after I turned it off.

senses.definition: 想得到細微、唔重要嘅#著數 (to go after petty advantages)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呀媽成日貪小便宜攞好多贈品翻嚟，屋企就快冇位啦！
examples.translation: My mum always go after petty advantages. My home will be out of space soon because of the giveaways she takes from different shops.

senses.definition: #羽絨 褸嘅別稱；入面塞滿鵝嘅羽毛嘅保暖褸（量詞：件） (down jacket; literally: space jacket)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 進行審訊、訴訟嘅法庭入面；引申指某場審訊、訴訟當中 (in court; in a court of law; figuratively, in a trial)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 法官認為證人喺庭上嘅口供唔可信。
examples.jyutping: faat3 gun1 jing6 wai4 zing3 jan4 hai2 ting4 soeng6 ge3 hau2 gung1 m4 ho2 seon3.
examples.translation: The judge considers the testimony in court untrustworthy.

senses.definition: 一種書寫系統，屬於元音附標文字，用嚟書寫北#印度 同#尼泊爾 嘅語言，例如#印地文、#梵文、尼泊爾文等等 (Devanagari)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種書寫系統，屬於元音附標文字，用嚟書寫北#印度 同#尼泊爾 嘅語言，例如#印地文、#梵文、尼泊爾文等等 (Devanagari)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 睇准#時機 再開始行動 (to take actions only at an opportune moment)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 好多時候佢都喺度等，睇準先起筷。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 si4 hau6 keoi5 dou1 hai2 dou6 dang2, tai2 zeon2 sin1 hei2 faai3
examples.translation: He usually spends most of his time on waiting - takes actions only at an opportune moment.

senses.definition: #調校 (to tune)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 zi1 git3 taa1 tun1 hou2 mei6 gaa3?
examples.translation: Is your guitar tuned?

examples.text: 佢地冇睇上眼，相親失敗！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 mou5 tai2 soeng5 ngaan5, soeng1 can1 sat1 baai6!
examples.translation: They didn't fall in love; the blind date was a failure!

senses.definition: 指官員貪污收賄、妄顧法紀 (to pervert justice with bribery)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 高官貪贓枉法，令人民唔再信任政府。
examples.translation: That senior officials receive bribes and pervert justice, has caused the public to distrust the government.

senses.definition: #煲 完#湯 嘅湯料（量詞：兜／碗） (the meat, vegetables and/or other solid ingredients in boiled soup)

examples.jyutping: tong1 zaa1 dou1 jau5 jing4 joeng5 gaa3.
examples.translation: The food ingredients in boiled soup are also nutritious.

senses.definition: 一種可以改變光線（電磁波）方向嘅設備，通常係形狀或密度唔規則嘅玻璃（量詞：塊） (lens)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 比喻兩樣嘢之間極大嘅分別 (vast difference; literally: the difference between heaven and earth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你想日日揸靚車鋸牛扒，我日日捱飯盒都無所謂，睇嚟我哋兩個對生活嘅要求真係有天淵之別。
examples.jyutping: nei5 soeng2 jat6 jat6 zaa1 leng3 ce1 goe3 ngau4 paa2, ngo5 jat6 jat6 ngaai4 faan6 hap2 dou1 mou5 so2 wai6, tai2 lai4 ngo5 dei6 loeng5 go3 deoi3 sang1 wut6 ge3 jiu1 kau4 zan1 hai6 jau5 tin1 jyun1 zi1 bit6.
examples.translation: You dreamed of steaks and Porsche while I am contented with a simple meal. It comes to me that we are vastly different from each other in terms of quality of life.

senses.definition: 文學或藝術作品中，表現主題所用嘅材料 (量詞：個) (subject matter; theme)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢部電影嘅題材好敏感。
examples.jyutping: ne1 bou6 din6 jing2 ge3 tai4 coi4 hou2 man5 gam2.
examples.translation: The theme of this film is very sensitive.

examples.translation: tradition

senses.definition: 即係#剝光豬 (same as #剝光豬)

examples.text: 病人要劏光豬俾醫生檢查。
examples.jyutping: beng6 jan4 jiu3 tong1 gwong1 zyu1 bei2 ji1 sang1 gim2 caa4.
examples.translation: Patients need to take off all their clothes for doctors to check their bodies.

senses.definition: 頭部喺冇外傷嘅情況下，感覺到痛楚 (to have a headache)

examples.jyutping: pin1 tau4 tung3
examples.translation: migraine

senses.definition: 為一啲事擔心或者煩惱 (feeling puzzled and troubled by something, literally "headache")

examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 si6 gaau2 dou3 ngo5 hou3 tau4 tung3.

examples.jyutping: gwo3 lai4 si3 haa5 ngo5 zing1 sam1 tiu4 pui3 ge3 je5 jam2.

senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢做嘢嗰陣向攝影師偷師學藝，呢排影相進步咗。

examples.translation: He secretly observes and learns techniques from the photographer when he is working. He has taken better photos recently.

senses.definition: 為咗實現共同目標而組成嘅一班人（量詞：個） (team; group)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tyun4 deoi2 zing1 san4
examples.translation: team spirit

senses.definition: #兒童#服裝（量詞：件／套） (children's wear)

senses.definition: 遠望 (to look into distance)

examples.translation: To enhance the unified image of our company, staff should wear uniform to come to work starting from next month.

senses.definition: 結咗婚嘅女人私底下畀情夫錢 (to give money secretly to one's lover (said of a married woman); literally: stick bloke)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 gong2 mat1 nei5 dou1 teng1 m4 jap6 ji5.

senses.definition: 預先去殼用膠兜裝住嘅嘅蠔，唔可以生食 (bottled oysters; jarred oysters; oysters packaged in a relatively large "bucket" and not intended to be eaten raw)

senses.definition: 一種能源；透過#太陽能板，將光能轉化做電力嘅發電技術，或者用#太陽 嘅熱能嚟加熱嘅技術 (solar energy)

senses.definition: 可以將#光 轉為#電力 嘅平板裝置（量詞：塊） (solar cell)

senses.definition: 文章切合題目 ((of essays) to be relevant to the topic)

senses.definition: 利用黏力將一件物件依附喺另一樣嘢嘅表面 (to stick something on; to paste something on)

examples.jyutping: tip3 soeng5 jau4 piu3
examples.translation: to stick on a stamp

senses.definition: 通知嘅文件（量詞：封／張／份） (written notice; advice note; statement)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 aam1 aam1 sau1 dou3 ngan4 hong4 gei3 bei2 ngo5 ge3 fu6 fun2 tung1 zi1 syu1
examples.translation: I have just received the pay statement from the bank.

senses.definition: 空出時間或者空間 (to squeeze some time or space for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你可唔可以騰空同我食餐飯？
examples.jyutping: nei5 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 tang4 hung1 tung4 ngo5 sik6 caan1 faan6?

senses.definition: 用條#脷 輕輕力掃 (to lap; to lick)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #坑渠、去水管清潔劑，可以令塞咗嘅坑渠通返，成分為強#酸 或強#鹼 (drain cleaner)

senses.definition: 徹底改過 (to repent thoroughly of one's errors)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #金星，因朝早出現喺東邊而又好光而得名 (Venus, the planet; literally: morning star)

senses.definition: 泛指欣賞#戲曲 (to listen to traditional Chinese Opera music)

examples.text: 以前啲人興去茶樓聽曲，依家冇晒咯。

examples.translation: It used to be a common practice to go to tea house to listen to Cantonese Opera music, but not anymore.

senses.definition: 由一個大#商場 劃分出嚟業權獨立、面積好細（如百零呎）嘅#舖頭 (sub-divided shop (inside a mall))

examples.text: 唔好亂咁投資劏舖，好易變死場。
examples.translation: Don't invest in sub-divided shops, they will likely become dead malls.

senses.definition: 一種清潔工具；將布條嘅部分整濕然後擰乾，就可以用嚟抹地（量詞：個） (a tool used for mopping the floor)
