examples.text: 好多屋企都唔再用傳統拖把，轉咗用拖地機械人。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 uk1 kei2 dou1 m4 zoi3 jung6 cyun4 tung2 to1 baa2, zyun3 zo2 jung6 to1 dei6 gei1 haai6 jan4.
examples.translation: Many households no longer use traditional mops. They now use mopping robots.

senses.definition: 某啲宗教舉行#法事 嘅場所 (A place that hosts a ceremony held by monks or Daoshi to ensure the passing of death for certain religions)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 古代朝會盟誓同封拜大將所設嘅高臺。 (A terrace that is set for the coronation of generals & oath of alliance)
古代用嚟舉行祭祀嘅高臺。禮記．祭義：「#祭日於壇」。 (A terrace that is set for offering sacrifices to the gods or ancestors)

examples.translation: Temple of Heaven, Temple of Earth in Beijing

senses.definition: 用土堆砌成嘅矮枱（古詞） (A short table made by dirt mound (Archaic))
#鐵鏽 (rust)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 帶鄙視咁鬧 (to spit on and curse; to revile)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gaan1 san4 sau6 maan6 man4 toe3 maa6.
examples.translation: That treacherous officials were spat on and cursed by everyone.

senses.definition: 將秘密或者情報講畀另一方嘅人知 (to leak information to someone not on your side; to share intrigue with others)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 一樣嘢直接令到一個人嘅身體健康慢慢變差 ((of one's health) to pull down, to run down)

senses.definition: 一個人伸直自己個背脊，唔駝背 (to straighten one's back; to square one's shoulders)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 一灘可以清楚見到#倒影 嘅水，稱呼得嘅通常係#影相 嘅熱點 (sky mirror)

senses.definition: 用剃刀之類嘅工具去刮走面上嘅雜毛 (to shave facial hair)

senses.definition: 以後或者暫時唔再做一件事 (to stop; to cease; to halt; to suspend)

examples.jyutping: ting4 zi2 jing4 jip6
examples.translation: suspension of business

senses.definition: 其中一個人過咗身，同其他人永遠都冇辦法再見 (to part forever)

senses.definition: 位於#扶手電梯 兩端嘅零件，用嚟隔走梯級嘅雜物，防止內部機器損受損 (escalator comb)

senses.definition: 降低職級、地位 (to be downgraded in terms of rank/status; to resign from a higher position)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: teoi3 geoi1 ji6 sin3
examples.translation: to be downgraded to the second line of duty; to resign from a leading post (and assume an advisory post)

senses.definition: 位於#子宮 內壁同埋#胎兒 之間嘅#組織，胎兒可以透過#臍帶 得到氧氣同埋營養，排出二氧化碳同埋廢物去到母體血液（量詞：個） (placenta)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 超聲波照到胎盤有啲低，下次要再檢查。

examples.translation: The placenta is low-lying on the ultrasound, so we need to recheck next time.

senses.definition: 有講有笑，傾得好開心 (to talk cheerfully and humorously)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 縱使戰爭即將來臨，佢同朋友仍然談笑風生。
examples.jyutping: zung3 si2 zin3 zang1 zik1 zoeng1 loi4 lam4, keoi5 tung4 pang4 jau5 jing4 jin4 taam4 siu3 fung1 sang1.
examples.translation: Even if the war is coming, he and his friends are still talking cheerfully and humorously.

senses.definition: 設計圖、#圖則（量詞：個） (design; draft; drawing)
字面意思就係#頹廢 嘅飯；即係大學飯堂入面，賣得相對廉價，而食材亦都比較簡單，例如係#午餐肉、#腸仔、#蛋 呢啲冇骨嘅食物，可以淨係用一隻手揸匙羹食嘅飯 ("cursory rice")

senses.definition: 透露、講自己嘅心情或秘密俾人知 (speak out)

examples.translation: I realise that the $100 banknote is fake only after careful observation!

senses.definition: 問人；請教人 (to consult; to ask for advice)

senses.definition: 從袋中（通常係衫袋，褲袋）拎一樣嘢出嚟 (to take something out; to draw out)

senses.definition: 電訊公司嘅月費 (charge from the telecom companies)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容人講嘢唔經大腦，唔考慮其他人嘅感受 (to speak without thinking; to speak rashly or thoughtlessly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢成日貪口爽，搞到而家犯眾憎。
examples.translation: He always speaks without thinking and is now hated by everyone.

senses.definition: 就一個題目交換意見或者辯論（量詞：番／次） (discussion; talk)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hok6 seot6 tou2 leon6
examples.translation: academic discussion

senses.definition: 冇生到#樹葉 或者#頭髮 (bare; uncovered; naked)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 棵樹光禿禿，一塊葉都冇。
examples.jyutping: po1 syu6 gwong1 tuk1 tuk1, jat1 faai3 jip6 dou1 mou5.
examples.translation: The tree is totally bare, there's not even one leaf there.

senses.definition: 一份#報紙 或者#雜誌 嘅第一頁或者封面，喺擺出去賣嘅時候會向外面俾人見到，吸引人買 (front page of a newspaper or a magazine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tau4 baan2 san1 man4
examples.translation: front-page news

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
奉獻、犧牲自己，去幫助其他人成功 (to help others to success by sacrificing oneself, literally "to carry the sedan chair")
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 向上#跳 (to jump up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你要跳高啲先會摸倒個波。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 tiu3 gou1 di1 sin1 wui5 mo2 dou2 go3 bo1.
examples.translation: You have to jump up higher in order to touch the ball.

senses.definition: 托洛斯基所主張嘅馬克思主義；推崇不斷嘅革命，將馬克思主義推廣到全世界 (Trotskyism)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 望落似#肚臍 而得名，即係#花占餅（量詞：塊） (belly button biscuits; gem biscuits)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 豬仔；亦泛指#豬 (pig)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 由一條或以上嘅#線，或者#邊 構成嘅平面形狀，會框著約干大細嘅#面積 (figure; geometric figure)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 為咗讓位嚟畀一樣嘢，而削減其他嘢 (to make room; to find time)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 心神不寧嘅樣子 (perturbed, nervous, uneasy, fidgety)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: be very upset; be in fidgets; be in a rather nervous state; be on nettles;

senses.definition: （古裝劇入面）#徒弟 同#師父 講嘢嘅時候對自己嘅稱呼 ((used in costume dramas) the term for a student to address oneself when speaking to one's master)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 做嘢特登放慢手腳，拖延時間、減慢工作嘅效率同進度，係一種#抗議 或者攪破壞嘅方法 (to slow down at work deliberately, as  a form of protest or sabotage)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 防禦非常穩固 (an impregnable fortress; literally:  copper and iron wall)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 原本係講#輩份 一樣嘅人，以前輩份一樣嘅人嘅歲數都會差唔多，而家輩份一樣嘅人嘅歲數可能差好遠，但係同輩就變成指歲數差唔多嘅人 (peer; person of the same generation)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #氣候 ((also 天口 /tin1hau2/)(compare 天氣 /tin1hei3/)  weather)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daai6 jit6 tin1 si4
examples.translation: hot weather

senses.definition: 自然有利嘅#時機 (opportunity)

examples.translation: good timing, geographical convenience and good human relations.

senses.definition: 時間 (timeliness)
#通常 稱為 (generally called; normally referred to as)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 警察制服嘅一部分；由兩條皮帶組成，一條正常咁纜喺腰間，另一條就打斜咁穿過右邊膊頭嘅肩章，扣著第一條左邊嘅前後兩面；設計來自英軍嘅禮服，自從換咗做依家套新制服之後就無咗 (Sam Browne belt, especially the cross-belt; literally: sky-earth line)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 天衣無縫嘅詐騙布置，被騙者喺受害後都唔知道俾人設局欺騙。常見嘅個案係以傾生意為名，先邀約事主參與造假嘅雀局或牌局，合謀出千欺詐騙財。 (a conspiracy between members of a gambling ring to rob an unsuspecting outsider, a gambling con or "sting". Literally: heavenly fairy plot.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 通行無阻 (unobstructed; clear)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 即係#蓮霧 (java apple; wax jambu)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 將需要嘅#資料#寫 喺所指定嘅#空間 (to fill in; to write)

examples.jyutping: tin4 se2 biu2 gaak3

senses.definition: 寫嘅嘢讀者睇得明，意思清晰，又有條理 ((of writings) clear and coherent; smooth)

examples.jyutping: man4 geoi3 tung1 seon6

senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺#燒嘢食#起爐 嘅時候，燒着之後可以令啲炭快啲燒着嘅燃料（量詞：嚿） (barbecue charcoal fire starter)

senses.definition: 偷偷哋笑；靜靜雞笑；收收埋埋咁笑；唔張揚咁笑 (to snicker; to titter; to laugh in a suppressed way)

examples.translation: The guests are gradually leaving the dinner party.

senses.definition: 空氣可以流通 (well-ventilated)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gaan1 fong2 hou2 tung1 fung1 wo3!
examples.translation: The room is well-ventilated!

senses.definition: 喺同一個公司、機構做事嘅人。亦可以寫成#同人 (fellow official; colleague)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tung4 jan4 ging3 ho6
examples.translation: congratuation from all staff

senses.definition: 喺同一個公司、機構做事嘅人 (colleague)
